   // tarkatāṇḍavam //	// tarka tANxavam //
   śrīrāghavendratīrthakṛtanyāyadīpākhyāvyākhyāsamalaṅkṛtam	SrI rAGava indra tIrTa kRta nyAya dIpa AKyA vyAKyA samalaFkRtam
   mukhopanyāsaḥ	muKa upanyAsaH
   vyāsatrayanāmnā prathiteṣu candrikānyāyāmṛtatarkatāṇḍavākhyeṣu grantheṣu	vyAsa traya nAmnA praTitezu candrikA anyAya amRta tarka tANxava AKyezu granTezu
   kṛtavimarṣānāṃ mahodayānāṃ vicāracāturī svasiddhāntavaikharī	kRta vimarzAnAm mahA udayAnAm vicAra cAturI sva sidDAnta vEKarI
   sutatvasādhurī ca sugamatayā bhavatīti nāviditamuddhoṣayāmo vayam /	suta tva sADurI ca sugamatayA Bavati iti na aviditam udDozayAmaH vayam /
   triṣvapyeṣu tarkatāṇḍavākhyoyaṃ vādagranthādirājaḥ nigamopakāratayā	trizu api ezu tarka tANxava AKyoyam vAda granTa Adi rAjaH nigama upakAra tayA
   śiṣṭaprarigṛhītāsu tarkaśāstraparamparāsvāgantukānāṃ,"vedāḥ kenacit kṛtāḥ	Sizwa prarigRhItAsu tarka SAstra paramparAsu AgantukAn AM," vedAH kenacid kRtAH
   / na pramāṇam / api tu sahakārimahinmaiva pramāṇam / īśvaraḥ parimitaguṇaḥ	/ na pramANam / api tu sahakAri mahinmA eva pramANam / ISvaraH parimita guNaH
   / duḥkhadhvaṃso mokṣaḥ"ityādimaviṣayān nigamamahimāpakarṣakān	/ duHKa DvaMsaH mokzaH"iti Adi mavizayAn nigama mahimA apakarzakAn
   pratipādayatāṃ prabandhānāṃ dūṣaṇīyatāṃ, nigamavirodhākūtānāmādaraṇīyatāṃ	pratipAdayatAm prabanDAnAm dUzaNIyatAn, nigama viroDa AkUtAnAm AdaraNIya tAm
   ca yuktyaiva samarpayati / yadasya nāmni; tarke tāṇḍavaṃ, tarkasya	ca yuktyA eva samarpayati / yat asya nAmni; tarke tANxavan, tarkasya
   taṇḍavaṃ, tarke tāṇḍavamiti ca tridhā vigrahītavyamāste / tena hi saptamyā	taNxavan, tarke tANxavam iti ca triDA vigrahItavyam Aste / tena hi saptamyA
   adhaḥkārasya, ṣaṣṭyā bhāvāviṣkaraṇaceṣṭāviśeṣarūpatāṇḍavānvayinaḥ	aDas kArasya, zazwyAH BAva AvizkaraNa cezwA viSeza rUpa tANxava anvayinaH
   sambandhasya, anumārtakatarkaśabdena yukteśca sulabho lābhaḥ /	sambanDasya, anumArtaka tarka Sabdena yukteH ca sulaBaH lABaH /
   kathamasminkalpanīvanāvanapathe niḥśaṅkasañcaraṇamādaraśceti śaṅkā	kaTam asmin kalpanIvanA vanapaTe niHSaFka saQcaraNam AdaraH ca iti SaFkA
   paramavaśiṣyate / tatraitadvyānasya diśaṃ pratyaṅguli prasārayāmaḥ /	param avaSizyate / tatra etat vyAnasya diSam pratyaFguli prasArayAmaH /
   vyākhyānasyāsya, tātparyacandrikāyāḥ prakaśasyeva, sudhāyāḥ parimalasyeva	vyAKyAnasya Asya, tAtparya candrikAyAH prakaSasi eva, suDAyAH parimalasya iva
   ca nartanopakārakavastunāmnā na nāmābhihitam / api tu mulanāmnopi	ca nartana upakAraka vastu nAmnA na nAma aBihitam / api tu mula nAmnA upi
   svanāmnaiva vyācikhyāsayā, śuṣkanyāyaṃ dīpayati dahatīti, sannyāyaṃ	sva nAmnA eva vyAci KyAsayA, Suzka nyAyam dIpayati dahati iti, sannyAyam
   prakāśayatīti, nyāyena yuktyā prakāśata iti ca sulabhatrivivāraṇaṃ	prakASa yati iti, nyAyena yuktyA prakASate iti ca sulaBa trivivAraNam
   nyāyadīpanāmaiva / naitavadeva santi ca vākyāni/ sampuṭesmin dvitīyapuṭe	nyAya dIpanAmA eva / na etavadeva santi ca vAkyAni/ sampuwesmin dvitIya puwe
   caturdaśatamapaṅkeḥ"atra nyāyacintāpare	caturdaSatama paFkeH "atra nyAya cintA pare
   granthe"ityāramya"brahmatantroktaprameyanirṇayopayuktapramāṇanyāyacintāparatvāttadviṣayādinaivāsya	granTe"iti Aramya" brahma tantra ukta prameya nirNaya upayukta pramANa nyAya cintA paratvAt tad vizaya AdinA eva asya
   viṣayādimattā"iti; tṛtīyasampuṭe navamāṅkau"tāṇḍavakaraṇasya prasañjakaṃ	vizaya Adi matta a"iti; tRtIya sampuwe navamAFkO"tANxava karaNasya prasaQjakam
   pūrvaraṅgaṃ nibadhnāti"iti ca / dvitīyasampuṭe upayuktacintāpadābhyāṃ	pUrva raFgam nibaDnAti"iti ca / dvitIya sampuwe upayukta cintA padAByAm
   brahmatantrā(vedāntānā)nukūlānanukūlanyāyoryuktāyuktatvāvimarśanasya	brahma tantrA( vedAntAn A)nukUla ananukUla nyAyoH yuktA yukta tva avimarSanasya
   tṛtīyapuṭapaṅktyā nartanārthavivakṣāyāḥ, sarvatra yuktyanudhāvanasya	tRtIya puwa paFktyAH nartana arTa vivakzAyAH, sarvatra yukti anuDAvanasya
   cāvagamaḥ sulabhaḥ//	ca avagamaH sulaBaH//
   idṛṅmahimnosya granthasya prathamaṃ sampuṭamidānīṃ prakāśayāmaḥ / tatra	idRS mahimnosya granTasya praTamam sampuwam idAnIm prakASayAmaH / tatra
   prathamataḥ granthaṃ	praTamatas granTam

   āstāmanantaraṃ vipulā granthavicāraṇā / karturapi vicāraṇe	AstAm anantaram vipulA granTa vicAraNA / kartuH api vicAraNe
   saṅkucitaivāsmadīyā pravṛttiḥ/ yataḥ pracīnaḥ somanāthakavivareṇyaḥ	saFkucitA eva asmadIyA pravRttiH/ yatas pracInaH soma nATaka vi vareNyaH
   vyāsavijayākhyakāvye suviśālamupāślokayat / upalabhamāhe	vyAsa vijaya AKya kAvye su viSAlam upASlokayat / upalaBa mAhe
   ca mudritaṃ kāvyamidamidānīm //	ca mudritam kAvyam idam idAnIm //
   suvicāravicāraṇāvivekaśauṇḍasyāsya tarkatāṇaḍavasya; apareṣāṃ  1.	su vicAra vicAraNa aviveka SONxasya asya tarka tANa xavasya; aparezAn 1.
   nyāyāmṛtam,	nyAya amRtam,
   2. tātparyacandrikā, 3. tatvavivekaṭīkāmandāramañjarī, 4.	2. tAtparya candrikA, 3. tatva vivekawIkA mandAra maQjarI, 4.
   upādhikaṇḍanaṭīkāmandāramañjarī, 5. māyāvādakhaṇḍanaṭīkāmandāramañjarī, 6.	upADi kaNxa nawI kA mandAra maQjarI, 5. mAyA vAda KaNxa nawI kA mandAra maQjarI, 6.
   mithyātvānumānakhaṇḍanaṭīkāmandāramañjarī, 7. bhedojjīvanam, ityeṣāmapi	miTyAtva anumAna KaNxa nawI kA mandAra maQjarI, 7. Beda ujjIvanam, iti ezAm api
   granthāmanāṃ grathayitāraḥ padavākyapramāṇajñāḥ sampradāyārthakovidāḥ	granTAmanAm graTayitAraH pada vAkya pramANa jQAH sampradAya arTa kovidAH
   vyāsarājamunayaḥ /	vyAsa rAja munayaH /
   ebhyaḥ pāravrājyapradātāraḥ  	eByaH pAravrAjya pradAtAraH  
   "kaṃsadhvaṃsipadāmbhoja saṃsakto haṃsapuṅgavaḥ /	"kaMsa DvaMsi padA amBoja saMsaktaH haMsa puFgavaH /
   brahmaṇyagururājākhyo vartatāṃ mama mānase"//	brahmaNyaguruH AjA AKyaH vartatAm mama mAnase"//
   iti tātparyacandrikādāvādṛtā brahmaṇyatīrthamunivareṇyāḥ / vidyāguravastu	iti tAtparya candrikA dO= AdRtAH brahmaNya tIrTa muni vareNyAH / vidyA gura vastu
   sarvaśāstraviśāradāḥ jñānabhaktivairāgyādiguṇagumbhitāḥ śrīpādarājāḥ iti	sarva SAstra viSAradAH jQAna Bakti vErAgya Adi guNa gumBitAH SrI pAda rAjAH iti
   viśrutā lakṣmīnārāyaṇamunayaḥ / imamapyabhiprayantigranthakārā eva	viSrutAH lakzmI nArAyaNa munayaH / imam api aBiprayanti granTa kArAH eva

   suprasiddhāḥ //	su prasidDAH //

   śāsanasaṃpādito nirṇayaḥ /"vijayanagarādhīśakṛṣṇadevarājena gaurapurābhido	SAsana saMpAditaH nirNayaH /"vijaya nagara aDISa kRzNa deva rAjena gOra pura aBidaH

   uddhṛtaḥ //	udDRtaH //

   iti tridhā paricchedanāmnā vibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ / 487 puṭe 7 paṅktyau, 490   12	iti triDA paricCeda nAmnA viBAgaH kRtaH / 487 puwe 7 paFktyO, 490  12

   suvyaktamidam //	su vyaktam idam //

   vyākhyānasyāsya vākyavimarśakā abhyupagaccheyuḥ / mūlepi keṣicitpustakeṣu	vyAKyAnasya asya vAkya vimarSakAH aByupagacCeyuH / mUlepi kezicid pustakezu
   184 tamapuṭe 9 mapaṅktau"ityutpatti svatastvavāde"ityasti //	184 tamapuwe 9 mapaFktO" iti utpatti svatas tu avAde"iti asti //
   āstāmayaṃ vicāraḥ / itthamasti mahāvādeṣu	AstAmayam vicAraH / itTam asti mahA vAdezu
   vinyastānāmaṇuvādānāmiyattānirṇayaḥ//	vinyastAnAm aNu vAdAnAm iyatta anirNayaH//
   prathame prāmāṇyavāde ..... aṣṭādaśa ..... 18	praTame prAmANya vAde ..... azwAdaSa ..... 18
   dvitīye ........ uttarāstrayaḥ ... 3	dvitIye ........ uttarAH trayaH ... 3
   tṛtīye .......... anantara eka eva 1	tRtIye .......... anantaraH ekaH eva 1
   caturthe ......... tataḥ ṣaṭ .... 6	caturTe ......... tatas zaw .... 6
   pañcame ......... upari dvau ..... 2	paQcame ......... upari dvO ..... 2
   ṣaṣṭe ......... avaśiṣṭau ...... 2 iti /	zazwe ......... avaSizwO ...... 2 iti /
   pratipādanīyaḥ.	pratipAdanIyaH.
   ādāveva nāmānirvacanāvyājena pratipādanīyo viṣayaḥ sāmānyataḥ	AdO= eva nAma anirvacana avyAjena pratipAdanIyaH vizayaH sAmAnyatas 
   pradarśitaprāya eva/ kevalanaiyāyikābhidhānānāmanṛsṛtavedānāṃ ca	pradarSita prAyaH eva/ kevala nEyAyika aBiDAnAnAm anRsRta vedAnAm ca
   jñānajñānasādhanaviṣaye yatrayatra visaṃvādastatsamīkaraṇa eva	jQAna jQAna sADana vizaye yatra yatra visaMvAdaH tad samIkaraNaH eva
   granthakarturmukhyobhiprāyaḥ / teṣāṃsteṣāṃ saṃpuṭānāṃ prakāśanavelāyāṃ	granTa kartuH muKyoBiprAyaH / tezAn= tezAm saMpuwAnAm prakASana velAyAm
   viśeṣatastāṃstānviṣayān pratarśayiṣyāmaḥ //	viSezataH tAn= tAn vizayAn pratarSayizyAmaH //
   prakṛtasaṃpuṭe ayaṃ viṣayaviśeṣaḥ .	prakRta saMpuwe ayam vizaya viSezaH .
   pratyakṣakhaṇḍapratyakṣaparicchedaśabdābhyāmapi saṃketitesminsaṃpuṭe	pratyakza KaNxa pratyakza paricCeda SabdAByAm api saMketitesmin saMpuwe
   pratyakṣajñānānāṃ, tatsādhanānāṃ, tatprāmāṇyānāṃ, jñeyānāṃ ca nirūpaṇaṃ	pratyakza jQAnAnAM, tad sADanAnAM, tad prAmANyAnAM, jQeyAnAm ca nirUpaNam
   nyāyataḥ saṃprāptam / jñānājñeyasādhanāni pramāṇalakṣaṇapaddhatyādibhireva	nyAyataH saMprAptam / jQAna ajQeya sADanAni pramANa lakzaNa padDati AdiBiH eva
   sukhāvabodhanīti prāmāṇyamevorvaritam / tatrāpi prāmāṇyasvarūpaviṣaye na	suKa avaboDanI iti prAmANyam eva uH varitam / tatra api prAmANya svarUpa vizaye na
   tādṛśo vivādaḥ / api tu	tAdRSaH vivAdaH / api tu
   kathamasyotpattiḥ jñaptiścetyatraiva / ataḥ sa eva viṣayaḥ sāmānyarūpeṇa	kaTam asya utpattiH jQaptiH ca iti atra eva / atas saH eva vizayaH sAmAnya rUpeNa
   vicārapathapāntha iti suṣṭhu paśyāmaḥ nahi sāmānyākāreṇa carcitaṃ	vicAra paTa pAnTaH iti suzWu paSyAmaH nahi sAmAnya AkAreNa carcitam
   pratyakṣaprāmāṇyatvādirūpaviśeṣākāreṇa na sidhyati //	pratyakza prAmANya tva Adi rUpa viSeza AkAreNa na siDyati //
   pratyakṣaparicchede pratyakṣapramāṇyavicāra evānurūpaḥ / na tu	pratyakza paricCede pratyakza pramANya vicAraH eva anurUpaH / na tu
   śābdapramāṇyādeḥ / satyam / tattatparicchede tattatpramāṇyameva yadi	SAbda pramANi AdeH / satyam / tat tad paricCede tat tad pramANyam eva yadi
   nyarūpayiṣyan tadā, pramāṇyasāmānyasya na svatastvam kathaṃ	nyarUpayizyan tadA, pramANyasAmAnyasya na svatas tvam kaTam
   pramāṇyaviśeṣasyeti śaṅkāvaśiṣṭābhaviṣyat / ataḥ	pramANi aviSezasya iti SaFkA avaSizwA aBavizyat / atas 
   prathamyātsāmānyavicāreṇaivaviśeṣaśaṅkāyā api śānteratraiva	praTamyAt sAmAnya vicAreNa eva viSeza SaFkAyAH api SAnteH atra eva
   pramāṇyasāmānyanirūpaṇaṃ nānupapanna mityutpaśyāmaḥ  	pramANi asAmAnya nirUpaNam na anupapanna miti utpaSyAmaH  
   tatrāpi    	tatra api    
   (ka) pāmāṇyaṃ svata iti vedāntinaḥ	(ka) pAmANyam svatas iti vedAntinaH
   ,, parata iti naiyāyikāḥ	,, paratas iti nEyAyikAH
   (kha) vedāḥ apauruṣeyā nityāśceti vedāntinaḥ	(Ka) vedAH apOruzeyAH nityAH ca iti vedAntinaH
   īśvaroccaritā anityā iti naiyāyikāḥ	ISvara uccaritAH anityAH iti nEyAyikAH
   (ga) īśvarasya sārvajñyādikaṃ vedenaiva siddhyatīti vedāntinaḥ	(ga) ISvarasya sArvajQi Adikam vedena eva sidDyati iti vedAntinaH
   dharmāgrāhakānumānairiti naiyāyikāḥ	Darma AgrAhaka anumAnEH iti nEyAyikAH
   (gha) varṇāḥ nityavibhudravyāṇīti vedāntinaḥ	(Ga) varNAH nitya viBu dravyANi iti vedAntinaH
   anityā guṇā iti naiyāyikāḥ	anityAH guNAH iti nEyAyikAH
   (ṅa) varṇaḥ saṃyogena jñeya iti vedāntinaḥ	(Fa) varNaH saMyogena jQeyaH iti vedAntinaH
   samavāyeneti naiyāyikāḥ	samavAyena iti nEyAyikAH
   (ca) nirvikalpajñānaṃ nāstīti vedāntinaḥ	(ca) nirvikalpa jQAnam na asti iti vedAntinaH
   astīti naiyāyikāḥ	asti iti nEyAyikAH
   iti ṣoḍā vipratipattayaḥ santi / tatra nirṇayāyaiva vādānāmaṅgīkāraḥ //	iti zoxAH vipratipattayaH santi / tatra nirNayAya eva vAdAnAm aFgIkAraH //
   pramāṇyaviṣayoyaṃ pariccheda ityuktvā vedeśvarādīnāṃ vicāraṇe kaḥ	pramANyaviza yoyam paricCedaH iti uktvA veda ISvara AdInAm vicAraNe kaH
   prasaṅgaḥ iti paraṃ śaṅkonmīlati / tāmevaṃ pratibrūmaḥ //	prasaFgaH iti param SaFkA unmIlati / tAm evam pratibrUmaH //
   prakrānte pramāṇyasvatastve yāyā bādhakāśaṅkāḥ samāpatanti	prakrAnte pramANi asvataH tve yAyAH bADaka ASaFkAH samApatanti
   tāsāmasamīkaraṇe siddhāntasya na susthāpanā bhaviṣyatīti vādapañcakānāṃ	tAsAm asamIkaraNe sidDAntasya na susTApanA Bavizyati iti vAda paQcakAnAm
   samāśrayaṇamiti / tataścaivaṃ pūrvapūrvavādānāmuttarottaravādānuṣaṅgitā //	samASrayaNam iti / tatas ca evam pUrva pUrvavAdAnAm uttarottara vAda anuzaFgitAH //
   jñānajñānasādhanānāṃ prāmāṇyasvatastve nirūpaṇīye vedepi tadanuvartamānaṃ	jQAna jQAna sADanAnAm prAmANyasvataH tve nirUpaNIye vedepi tad anuvartamAnam
   vedanityatvāpauruṣeyatvābhyāṃ suvyavasthāpitam / vedasya	veda nitya tva apOruzeya tvAByAm su vyavasTApitam / vedasya
   pauruṣeyatvādidamasaṃgatamiti śaṅkāpanodāya dvitīyasya	pOruzeya tvAt idam asaMgatam iti SaFkA apanodAya dvitIyasya
   vedāpauruṣeyatvavādasya racanā / pauruṣeyatve yānupapattistāmevaṃ	veda apOruzeya tva vAdasya racanA / pOruzeya tve yA anupapattiH tAm evam
   pariharāmīti prativādinaḥ pratyavasthāne tṛtīyasya vādasyārambhaḥ/	pariharAmi iti prativAdinaH pratyavasTAne tRtIyasya vAdasya AramBaH/
   varṇānāmanityatvattatsamudāyarūpavedānāmapyanityatvamiti praśne;	varNAnAm anitya tvad tad samudAya rUpa vedAnAm api anitya tvam iti praSne;
   śabdonityavibhudravyaṃ, dhvanirākāśaguṇaḥ, iti pratipādayataścaturthasya /	SabdaH nitya viBu dravyan, DvaniH AkASa guNaH, iti pratipAdayataH caturTasya /
   yadi śabdo nākāśaguṇaḥ tarhi śrotreṇākāśena na samavāyasaṃbandha iti	yadi SabdaH na AkASa guNaH tarhi SrotreNa AkASena na samavAya saMbanDaH iti
   kastaṃ śrotreṇa jānīyāditi kolāhalapraśamanāya samavāyaniṣedhayituḥ	kaH tam SrotreNa jAnIyAt iti kolAhala praSamanAya samavAya nizeDayituH
   pañcamasya / samavāyābhāve nirvikalpaka savikalpakabhedena	paQcamasya / samavAya aBAve nirvikalpaka sa vikalpaka Bedena
   pratyakṣapramādvaividhyamunmūlitaṃ bhavatītyuddhoṣasya sveṣṭatāṃ	pratyakza pramAt vEviDyam unmUlitam Bavati iti udDozasya svezwatAm
   prathamataḥ ṣaṣṭhasya ceti //	praTamatas zazWasya ca iti //
   pratipādanaparipāṭī.	pratipAdana paripAwI.
   viṣayācalanarītimekadeśe pramāṇyavāde dikpradarśanena pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ //	vizaya acala narItim eka deSe pramANyavAde diS pradarSanena pradarSayizyAmaH //
   "svataḥpramāṇaiḥ"itiśloke pramāṇyasya svatastvaṃ prakāntam / pramāṇaśabdaḥ	"svataH pramANEH "iti Sloke pramANyasya svatas tvam prakAntam / pramANa SabdaH
   yadi bhāvasādhanastadā pramāṇyaṃ jñanadharmaḥ / atha karaṇasādhanastarhi	yadi BAva sADanaH tadA pramANyam jQana DarmaH / aTa karaNa sADanaH tarhi
   jñānasādhanadharmaḥ / dvividhepyasmin prāmāṇye jñptau svatastvaṃ, utpattau	jQAna sADana DarmaH / dviviDepi asmin prAmANye jQptO svatas tvaM, utpattO
   svatastvaṃ ceti dvayīritirasti /	svatas tvam ca iti dvayIritiH asti /
   antato jñanagatasya jñaptau svatastvaṃ utpattau svatastvaṃ karaṇagatasya	antataH jQana gatasya jQaptO svatas tvam utpattO svatas tvam karaNa gatasya
   jñaptau svatastvaṃ, utpattau svatastvaṃ ceti cīturvidhyamāgatam / kramaśa	jQaptO svatas tvan, utpattO svatas tvam ca iti cItuH viDyam Agatam / kramaSa
   eṣāṃ nirūmaṇamāracyate //	ezAm nirUmaNam Aracyate //
   tacca    	tat ca    
   kiṃ tatsvatastvaṃ nāma ?	kim tat svatastvam nAma ?
   prakārāntare kānupapattiḥ ?	prakAra antare kA anupapattiH ?
   kiṃ pramāṇam ?	kim pramANam ?
   anupapattīnāṃ kathaṃ parihāraḥ ?	anupapattInAm kaTam parihAraH ?
   paratastvaṃ kuto na ?	paratas tvam kutas na ?
   iti śaṅkottarābhyāṃ suruciraṃ bhaviṣyatīti tathaivānudhāvati	iti SaFkA uttarAByAm su ruciram Bavizyati iti taTA eva anuDAvati
   vicāraṇāpravāhaḥ //	vicAraNa apravAhaH //
   sarvatrāpi svatastvaṃ nāma sahajatvaṃ, autsargikatvaṃ vā, na	sarvatra api svatas tvam nAma sahaja tvan, Otsargika tvam vA, na
   tvitarāpekṣaṇenāhitatvamitisāram / ata eva dvādaśatame puṭe"sahajatvāt	tu itara apekzaNena ahita tvam itisAram / atas eva dvAdaSatame puwe" sahaja tvAt
   pramāṇyagrahaṇasyautsargikatvarūpasvatastvāsiddhi"riti, 203	pramANi agrahaNasya Otsargika tva rUpasvataH tu AsidDi"riti, 203
   tamapuṭe,"pramājanakaśaktiḥ sahajā natu bhramajananaśaktivadādheye"ti	tamapuwe,"pramAjanaka SaktiH sahajAH na tu Brama janana Sakti vat ADeye"ti
   cāsti //	ca asti //
   1. jñānapramāṇyasya jñaptau svatastvam    	1. jQAna pramANyasya jQaptO svatas tvam    
   etacca tridhā niravak /"yāthārthyarūpasya tattajjñānapramāṇyasya	etat ca triDA niravak /"yATArTya rUpasya tad tad jQAna pramANyasya
   grāhyapramāṇyavirodhyupasthāpakasāmagryasamavahitagrāhyaprāmāṇyāśrayatattajjñānaviṣayakasākṣijñānaviṣayatvanaiyatyam"ityekam	grAhya pramANi aviroDi upasTApaka sAmagrya sama vahita grAhya prAmANya ASraya tat tad jQAna vizaya ka sa akzi jQAna vizaya tva nEyatyam"iti ekam
   /"tattajjñānapramāṇyasya	/"tad tad jQAna pramANyasya
   grāhyaprāmāṇyāśrayatattajjñānaviṣayakasākṣijñānaviṣayatvayogyatvam"ityaparam	grAhya prAmANya ASraya tat tad jQAna vizaya ka sa akzi jQAna vizaya tva yogya tvam "iti aparam
   naiyāyikā yadākāraṃ jñānamanuvyavasāyaṃ manyante tadevātra sākṣiśabditam /	nEyAyikAH yat AkAram jQAnam anuvyavasAyam manyante tat eva atra sAkzi Sabditam /
   sa sākṣī yadi jñānaṃ gṛhṇīyāt tarhi tatprāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇātyeva / yathā	sa sAkzI yadi jQAnam gRhNIyAt tarhi tat prAmANyam api gRhNAti eva / yaTA
   svayaṃ ganturgajasya kaṇṭakāpasaraṇaṃ prayojakameva na tu karaṇaṃ tathā	svayam gantuH gajasya kaNwaka apasaraNam prayojakam eva na tu karaNam taTA
   prāmāṇyavirodhyupasthāpakanivāraṇamapi / iti prathamaniruktyā	prAmANya viroDi upasTApaka nivAraNam api / iti praTama niruktyA
   paryavasitorthaḥ / dvitīyayā tu agnerdāhakaśaktivat sākṣiṇī	paryavasita UrTaH / dvitIyayA tu agneH dAhaka Sakti vat sAkziNI
   prāmāṇyagrahaṇaśaktirasti / agneḥ pratibandhakādadāhakatvavat asyāpi	prAmANya grahaNa SaktiH asti / agneH pratibanDakAt a dAhaka tva vat asya api
   prāmāṇyāviṣayatā / tathāpi karatalādau dāhyatavat prāmāṇyepi sākṣigrāhyatā	prAmANya avizaya tA / taTA api kara tala AdO dAhyatavat prAmANya ipi sa akzi grAhyatA
   / iti sākṣiviṣayatāyogyatvaṃ svatastvamiti phalitam / tṛtīyā niruktistu na	/ iti sAkzi vizayatA yogya tvam svatas tvam iti Palitam / tRtIyA niruktiH tu na
   svamatāsādharaṇetyāstām //	sva matAsA DaraNa iti AstAm //
   2. prakārāntare anupapattiḥ    	2. prakAra antare anupapattiH    
   "tadaprāmāṇyagrāhakayāvajjñānagrāhakasāmagrīgrāhyatvaṃ svatastvam /	"tad a prAmANya grAhaka yAvat jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI grAhya tvam svatas tvam /
   tadabhāvaśca paratastvam / iti maṇau pūrvapakṣe mīmāṃsakānāṃ svatastvaṃ	tad aBAvaH ca paratas tvam / iti maNO pUrva pakze mImAMsakAnAm svatas tvam
   niruktam / tasyātrāntato dūṣaṇamidabhihitamasti /"tat"iti śabdena	niruktam / tasya atra antatas dUzaNam idaBihitam asti /"tat"iti Sabdena
   prakaraṇaprāptaghaṭajñānaṃ yatra jāyate tatra tatprāmāṇyaṃ	prakaraNa prApta Gawa jQAnam yatra jAyate tatra tad prAmANyam
   na bhāsate, jñānaṃ paraṃ pratīyata iti bādha iti //	na BAsate, jQAnam param pratIyate iti bADaH iti //
   tajjñānaviṣayakajñānājanyajanyajñānaviṣayatvamiti pariṣkāropi	tad jQAna vizayaka jQAna ajanya janya jQAna vizaya tvam iti parizkAra upi
   kenāpyajanyeśvarajñānena sveṣṭasyānuvyavasāyasyāpi	kena api ajanyeSvara jQAnena sva izwasya anuvyavasAyasya api
   janyatvānupapannārthakaḥ//	janya tva anupapanna arTakaH//
   ataḥ tajjñānaviṣayaka janyajñānetyādyuktau, ubhayajña janyapadatyāgena	atas tad jQAna vizayaka janya jQAna ityAdi uktO, uBayajQa janya pada tyAgena
   ajanyatvasya svānukūlatayā nirvacane vā bādhādidoṣa evoktaḥ / sarvaṃ	ajanya tvasya sva anukUla tayA nirvacane vA bADa Adi dozaH eva uktaH / sarvam
   jñānaṃ guṇa iti vākye prayukte tādṛśameva śabdajñānaṃ jāyate /	jQAnam guNaH iti vAkye prayukte tAdRSam eva Sabda jQAnam jAyate /
   tadanuvyavasāyena tatprāmāṇyamavagāhyata iti sthitiḥ / ayamanuvyavasāyaḥ	tad anu vyavasAyena tat prAmANyam avagAhyate iti sTitiH / ayam anuvyavasAyaH
   atra yadviśeṣaṇamuktaṃ tādṛśo na bhavatīti sāram //	atra yat viSezaNam uktam tAdRSaH na Bavati iti sAram //
   3. svatastve pramāṇam    	3. svatas tve pramANam    
   "jñānapramāṇyaṃ svato grāhyaṃ parato 'gṛhyamāṇatve sati gṛhyamāṇatvāt	"jQAna pramANyam svatas grAhyam paratas agRhyamANa tve sati gRhyamANa tvAt 
   yadyadanyenāgṛhyamāṇatve sati grāhyaṃ tattena grāhyaṃ yathā	yat yat anyena AgRhyamANa tve sati grAhyam tat tena grAhyam yaTA
   cakṣuranyenāgṛhyamāṇaṃ rūpaṃ cakṣurgrāhyam"ityādi	cakzuH anyena AgRhyamANam rUpam cakzuH grAhyam "ityAdi
   prathamasvatastvaniruktyanurodhena;"vimato 'nuvyavasāyaḥ	praTama svatas tu anirukti anuroDena ;"vimataH anuvyavasAyaH
   svagrāhyajñānaprāmāṇyaviṣayakiraṇayogyaḥ anuvyavasāyatvāt	sva grAhya jQAna prAmANya vizaya kiraNa yogyaH anuvyavasAya tvAt 
   gṛhītapramāṇyasamānaviṣayakajñānāntarānuvyavasāyavat"ityādi	gRhIta pramANi asamAna vizaya ka jQAna antara anuvyavasAyavat" ityAdi
   dvitīyānurodhena coktam //	dvitIya anuroDena ca uktam //
   kevasatarkasaraṇyā pratipādikānāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ lalitavacanānuvādo na sukaraḥ	kevasa tarka saraNyA pratipAdikAnAm vizayANAm lalita vacana anuvAdaH na sukaraH
   sūpayukteśceti tāṃstathaiva parityajāmaḥ //	sUpa yukteH ca iti tAn= taTA eva parityajAmaH //
   4. prāmāṇyasvatastve anupapattiparihāraḥ     	4. prAmANyasvataH tve anupapatti parihAraH     
   idaṃ rajataṃ jānīmetyeko 'nuvyavasāyaḥ / etadanantaraṃ rajataṃ jñāne	idam rajatam jAnIma iti ekaH anuvyavasAyaH / etad anantaram rajatam jQAne
   prakāro vā na veti na saṃdehaḥ / ataḥ rajatatvaprakārakatvaṃ na	prakAraH vA na vA iti na saMdehaH / atas rajata tva prakAraka tvam na
   bahirarthaḥ / anuvyavasāyasya viṣayaścaitat / rajatatvaviśiṣṭaṃ na vā	bahis arTaH / anuvyavasAyasya vizayaH ca etat / rajata tva viSizwam na vA
   saṃdeha udeti / ato rajatatvavaiśiṣṭyaṃ bahirarthaḥ / nānuvyavasāyaviṣayaḥ	saMdehaH udeti / atas rajata tva vESizwyam bahis arTaH / na anuvyavasAya vizayaH
   / rajatatvavaiśiṣṭyādikaṃ pramāṇye praviṣṭamāste / ataḥ kathaṃ	/ rajata tva vESizwyAdikam pramANye pravizwam Aste / atas kaTam
   pramāṇyasvatastvasādhakānumānaiḥ pramāṇyamanuvyavasāyaviṣaya iti sādhanam?	pramANi asvataH tu asADaka anumAnEH pramANyam anu vyavasAya vizayaH iti sADanam?
   evaṃ bādhāditi śaṅkāyām; vyavasāye rajatatvavaiśiṣṭyagrāhyahitvaṃ kena	evam bADAt iti SaFkAyAm; vyavasAye rajata tva vESizwya grAhya hi tvam kena
   pramāṇena siddhyati anuvyavasāyeneti brūyāt / yadyanuvyavasāyaḥ	pramANena sidDyati anu vyavasAyena iti brUyAt / yadi anuvyavasAyaH
   tadaviṣayaḥ tasya siddhireva ? na syāditi diśā parihāraḥ //	tad avizayaH tasya sidDiH eva ? na syAt iti diSA parihAraH //
   5. jñāne jāte prathamataḥ pramāṇaṃ na veti saṃśayo bhavati / sa nodiyāt /	5. jQAne jAte praTamatas pramANam na vA iti saMSayaH Bavati / sa na udiyAt /
   jñānagrahaṇavelāyāmeva pramāṇyasthāparityāgāt / ityanyānupapattiḥ /	jQAna grahaNa velAyAm eva pramANyasTA parityAgAt / iti anya anupapattiH /
   pratibandhakābhāva eva prāmāṇyagrahaṇaniyama uktaḥ / na tu	pratibanDaka aBAvaH eva prAmANya grahaNa niyamaH uktaH / na tu
   pratibandhakasatve / pramāṇyasaṃśayasthale virodhī vartata iti na	pratibanDaka satve / pramANi asaMSaya sTale viroDI vartate iti na
   pramāṇyaṃ viṣayo bhavati, ataḥ saṃśayaḥ ityādidiśā parahāraḥ //	pramANyam vizayaH Bavati, atas saMSayaH iti Adi diSA para hAraH //
   6. prāmāṇyasvatastve ye hetava uktāste santu, sādhyāmābhūvan	6. prAmANyasvataH tve ye hetavaH uktAH te santu, sADyAma aBUvan
   ityaprayojakaśaṅkāyā itthaṃ parihāraḥ // mahati kārye yāgādau niṣkampaṃ	iti aprayojaka SaFkAyAH itTam parihAraH // mahati kArye yAga AdO nizkampam
   pravartituṃ vedādau prāmāṇyamavaśyavedyam / tathācaikasmin	pravartitum veda AdO prAmANyam avaSya vedyam / taTA ca ekasmin
   prāmāṇyamitareṇa, tatrānyena, tatrāpareṇetyanavasthā syāditi paratastvaṃ	prAmANyam itareNa, tatra anyena, tatra apareNa iti anavasTA syAt iti paratas tvam
   pramāṇyasya parityajya svatastvamevābhyupeyamiti //	pramANyasya parityajya svatas tvam eva aByupeyam iti //
   paratastvaṃ kuto na ?	paratas tvam kutas na ?
   7. pramāṇyaparatastve aprāmāṇyaśaṅkāparihāraṇāya	7. pramANi aparataH tve aprAmANya SaFkA parihAraNAya
   pramāṇyaniścayāvaśyakatayā uktarītyānavasthā eko doṣaḥ //	pramANi aniScaya AvaSyaka tayA ukta rItyA anavasTA ekaH dozaH //
   8. prāmāṇyamanumeyaṃ cet kathaṃ prathamataḥ prāmāṇyajñānaṃ,	8. prAmANyam anumeyam ced kaTam praTamatas prAmANya jQAnaM,
   sādhyāprasiddherityaparo doṣaḥ //	sADya aprasidDeH iti aparaH dozaH //
   "svāśrayaviṣayakaniścayāvadhikatṛtīyakṣaṇavṛttisamānādhikaraṇyasaṃśayaviṣayī 	"sva ASraya vizayaka niScayO= aDika tRtI yakzaNa vRtti samAna aDikaraNya saMSaya vizayI 
   bhataṃ jñānapramāṇyaṃ, grāhyajñānaprakāraprakāratayā tadvadviśeṣyatakatayā	Batam jQAna pramANyaM, grAhya jQAna prakAra prakAra tayA tadvat viSezyataka tayA
   ca svāśrayagrāhakatayāvajjñānāgrāhyaṃ,	ca sva ASraya grAhaka tayA avat jQAna AgrAhyaM,
   svāśrayaviṣayāvadhikatṛtīyakṣaṇavṛttisamānādhikaraṇasaṃśayakoṭitvāt,	sva ASraya vizayO= aDika tRtI yakzaNa vRtti samAna aDikaraNa saMSaya kowi tvAt,
   aprāmāṇyavat"	aprAmANyavat"
   ityasya aprāmāṇyaṃ svato na gṛhyate / jñanānantaraṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇe	iti asya aprAmANyam svatas na gRhyate / jQana anantaram tRtI yakzaNe
   aprāmāṇyasaṃśayodayāt / tathā pramānantaraṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇe	aprAmANya saMSaya udayAt / taTA pramA anantaram tRtI yakzaNe
   kkactprāmāṇyasaṃśayodayātprāmāṇyamapi na svataḥ iti sāram / ityaparaḥ	kkact prAmANya saMSaya udayAt prAmANyam api na svatas iti sAram / iti aparaH
   pratyudgamaḥ / tasyetthaṃ parāvartanam / atra	pratyudgamaH / tasya itTam parAvartanam / atra
   sādhye svāśrayagrāhakayāvajjñānapadaṃ sveṣṭāmanumitimapi saṅgṛhṇātīti	sADye sva ASraya grAhaka yAvat jQAna padam svezwAm anumitim api saFgRhNAti iti
   tadagrāhyatvasādhanamapasiddhāntadoṣakabalitam /	tad agrAhya tva sADanam apasidDAnta dozaka balitam /
   bādho vyāghātaśceti / rītyānavainayaivānumānāntarāṇyapi duṣṭanīti	bADaH vyAGAtaH ca iti / rItyAna vEnaya eva anumAna antarANi api duzwani iti
   jñānapramāṇyasya jñaptau paratastvaśaṅkā na susthirā //	jQAna pramANyasya jQaptO paratas tu aSaFkA na susTirAH //
   utpattau jñānapramāṇyasvatastvam.	utpattO jQAna pramANi asvataH tvam.
   asmin svatastvanirvacane na tādṛśaḥ prayāsaḥ / pūrvapakṣānumānenaiva	asmin svatas tu anirvacane na tAdRSaH prayAsaH / pUrva pakza anumAnena eva
   sādhyaviparītasya tasya sukhāvabodho bhaviṣyatītyatra tadanirucya 154	sADya viparItasya tasya suKa avaboDaH Bavizyati iti atra tat anirucya 154
   tamapuṭe aṣṭamapaṅktau"jñānajanakamātrādhīnajanmatvaṃ svatastva"mityuktam	tamapuwe azwama paFktO" jQAna janaka mAtra aDIna janma tvam svatas tva"m iti uktam
   pūrvasmin svatastvanirūpaṇe anukūlānyuktvā pratikūlānāṃ	pUrvasmin svatastu anirUpaNe anukUlAni uktvA pratikUlAnAm
   pariharaṇamityanuloma ādṛtaḥ / idīnīṃ pratikūlāni parihṛtyānukūlānāṃ	pariharaNam iti anulomaH AdRtaH / idInIm pratikUlAni parihRtya anukUlAnAm
   nirūpaṇamiti pratiloma ādriyate //	nirUpaNam iti pratilomaH Adriyate //
   tathācādau paratastvanirāsaḥ.	taTA ca AdO paratas tu anirAsaH.
   10. anityapramā jñānahetvatiriktahetujanyā kāryatve sati tadviśeṣatvāt	10. anitya pramA jQAna hetu atirikta hetu janyA kAryatve sati tad viSeza tvAt
   aprāmāṇyavat / ityādīnyanumānāni paratastvasādhakāni vartante / yathā	aprAmANya vat / ityAdIni anumAnAni paratas tu asADakAni vartante / yaTA
   apramā kāryaṃ jñānaviśeṣopīti sā jñānasāmānyakāraṇātiriktadoṣajanyā	apramA kAryam jQAna viSeza upIti sA jQAna sAmAnya kAraNa atirikta doza janyA
   tadvadanityapramāpi guṇādijanyeti tadarthaḥ / iti śaṅkā //	tadvat anitya pramA api guNa Adi janyA iti tad arTaH / iti SaFkA //
   pramā jñānaṃ hi / tasyāṃ heturjñānaheturiti nirvivādam / evamapi	pramA jQAnam hi / tasyAm hetuH jQAna hetuH iti nirvivAdam / evam api
   tadatiriktahetujanyatvaṃ yadi sādhyate tarhi bhavadanumāneṣu virodho	tad atirikta hetu janya tvam yadi sADyate tarhi Bavat anumAnezu viroDaH 
   bādhaśca / pramāyāḥ kāryatāṃ nirvahan kaścanaguṇopi nāsti /	bADaH ca / pramAyAH kArya tAm nirvahan kaScana guNa upi na asti /
   evamevetarāṇyanumanānyapītīdaṃ dakpradarśanamātram / iti parihāraḥ //	evam eva itarANi anumanAni api iti idam dakpradarSana mAtram / iti parihAraH //
   11. yadyapi pramāmātre guṇaḥ sāmānyo mā bhūt / anityapramāmātre	11. yadi api pramA mAtre guNaH sAmAnyaH mA BUt / anitya pramA mAtre
   avidyamānāsaṃsargrahādikaṃ guṇaḥ / iti cāru darśayate // tathāpi	avidyamAnA saMsargraha Adikam guNaH / iti cAru darSayate // taTA api
   kevalāsaṃsargāgrahasya bhramepi sulabhatayā avidyamānaviśeṣaṇena	kevala asaMsarga Agrahasya Bramepi sulaBa tayA avidyamAna viSezaNena
   viṣayasatvamevābhipreti brūyāt / viṣayasatvaṃ tu jñanasādhāraṇakāraṇam /	vizaya satvam eva aBipreti brUyAt / vizaya satvam tu jQanasa ADAraNa kAraNam /
   ataḥ na tatsvatastvavirodhi //	atas na tat svataH tu aviroDi //
   12. māstveko 'nugato guṇa anityapramāsu / ananugatairanekaireva	12. mA astu ekaH anugataH guNa anitya pramAsu / ananugatEH anekEH eva
   pramotpadyatām /"anityapramātvaṃ	pramA utpadyatAm /"a nitya pramAtvam
   svāśrayamātravṛttidharmāvacchinnakāryatāśrayamātravṛtti	sva ASraya mAtra vRtti Darma avacCinna kArya tA ASraya mAtra vRtti
   svāśrayamātravṛttidharmāvacchinnakāryatāpratiyogikakāraṇatvāśrayamātrānutpādyakāryamātravṛtt	sva ASraya mAtra vRtti Darma avacCinna kArya tA pratiyogika kAraNa tva ASraya mAtra anutpAdya kArya mAtra vRtt
   idharmatvāt apramātvavadityanumānaṃ tatra balamasti / apramātvaṃ	iDarma tvAt apramAtva vat iti anumAnam tatra balam asti / apramA tvam
   anityajñānasāmānyakāraṇāpekṣayā adhikaṃ kāraṇamapekṣate yatkāryaṃ	anitya jQAna sAmAnya kAraNa apekzayA aDikam kAraNam apekzate yat kAryam
   tanmātrasthitikam / atastat ; svāśrayajanyabhramavṛttayaḥ yeye dharmāḥ	tanmAtra sTitikam / atas tat ; sva ASraya janya Brama vRttayaH yeye DarmAH
   janyapratyakṣabhramatvādayaḥ tattadavacchinnakāryatāśrayāḥ	janya pratyakza Brama tva AdayaH tad tad avacCinna kArya tA ASrayAH
   janyapratyakṣabhramādayaḥ / tanmātre vartate / evaṃ ca    anityabhrama iti	janya pratyakza Brama AdayaH / tanmAtre vartate / evam ca   anitya BramaH iti
   naikajātīyaṃ kāryam / apitu pratyakṣānumityādibhedena nānā / tadanurodhena	na eka jAtIyam kAryam / apitu pratyakza anumiti Adi Bedena nAnA / tad anuroDena
   kāraṇānyapyanekānyeveti phalitam / tathaivānityapramā api nānā kāryāṇi /	kAraNAni api anekAni eva iti Palitam / taTA eva anitya pramA api nAnA kAryANi /
   tattkāraṇānyapi nānaiva / tattadanurūpā guṇāstatratatra kāraṇānīti	tatd kAraNAni api nAnA eva / tad tad anurUpAH guNAH tatra tatra kAraNAni iti
   paryavasitam //	paryavasitam //
   iyaṃ yajñapatyuktapañcamātrapadānumānataḥ śaṅkā / asyā itthaṃ pariharaḥ //	iyam yajQapati ukta paQca mAtra pada anumAnataH SaFkA / asyAH itTam pariharaH //
   santu nāmānityapramākāraṇāni nānā / na tāni guṇāḥ / apitu	santu nAma anitya pramA kAraNAni nAnA / na tAni guNAH / apitu
   asmadanumatāstattatpramāprāgabhāvā eva/ tathāpyuktānumāne	asmad anumatAH tad tad pramA prAgaBAvAH eva/ taTA api ukta anumAne
   sādhyahetusaṃgateḥ / ataḥ siddhasādhanaṃ doṣaḥ / iti //	sADya hetu saMgateH / atas sidDa sADanam dozaH / iti //
   13. anityapratyakṣapramātvaṃ kāryatāvacchegakam bādhakaṃ vinā	13. anitya pratyakza pramAtvam kArya tAvat Segakam bADakam vinA
   kāryamātravṛttitvāt ghaṭatvavat / ghaṭatvaṃ kāryamātre vartate / atastat	kArya mAtra vRtti tvAt Gawa tva vat / Gawa tvam kArya mAtre vartate / atas tat
   kāryatāvacchedakam / evamānityapratyakṣapramātvamapi syāt /	kArya tA avacCedakam / evam Anitya pratyakza pramAtvam api syAt /
   anityānumitipramātve śābdapramātve cāyameva kramaḥ / ityaparā śaṅkā //	anitya anumiti pramAtve SAbda pramAtve ca ayam eva kramaH / iti aparA SaFkA //
   pratyakṣapramāmātre indriyasaṃnikarṣor'thaśca na hetū / yadā śuktiṃ dṛṣṭvā	pratyakza pramA mAtre indriya saMnikarzoH aTaH ca na hetU / yadA Suktim dRzwvA
   rajatamiti bhramyati tadā sannikarṣasya śuktirūpārthasya ca tatra satvena	rajatam iti Bramyati tadA sannikarzasya Sukti rUpa arTasya ca tatra satvena
   śuktiriyāmiti pramodayāpatteḥ/ doṣaḥ śuktiṃ na bhāsayatīti yadi, tarhi	SuktiH iyAm iti pramodayA ApatteH/ dozaH Suktim na BAsayati iti yadi, tarhi
   doṣābhāva eva pramāyāmupayogī bhavatu / aparaṃ kāraṇaṃ māstu / ityuttaram	doza aBAvaH eva pramAyAm upayogI Bavatu / aparam kAraNam mA astu / iti uttaram
   14. anityapramātvaṃ, anityajñānatvaprayojakaṃ yāvat	14. anitya pramAtvan, anitya jQAna tva prayojakam yAvat 
   tadadhikaprayojakāpekṣaṃ adhikaprayojakasatve utpatteḥ adhikaprayokāsatve	tad aDika prayojaka apekzam aDika prayojaka satve utpatteH aDika prayoka asa tve
   anutpatteḥ apramātvavat / ityanumānena sthūlāvayavato vastunaḥ	anutpatteH apramAtva vat / iti anumAnena sTUla avayavataH vastunaH
   pratyakṣapramāyāṃ bhūyo 'vayavendrisannikarṣaḥ kāraṇam /	pratyakza pramAyAm BUyas avayava indri sannikarzaH kAraNam /
   saṃśayaviparyayottarasmin tasmin viśeṣapramā kāraṇam / niyamena	saMSaya viparyaya uttarasmin tasmin viSeza pramA kAraNam / niyamena
   pramārūpāyāmanumitau liṅgaparāmarśaḥ kāraṇam / tādṛśāyāṃ śābdapratītau	pramArUpAyAm anumitO liFga parAmarSaH kAraNam / tAdRSAyAm SAbda pratItO
   vākyārthajñānaṃ kāsaṇam"iti phalati iti pūrvapakṣe //	vAkya arTa jQAnam kAsaNam "iti Palati iti pUrva pakze //
   kāmilārogiṇaḥ śaṅke śaṅkatvaśuklatvajñānaṃ bhūyo	kAmilA rogiNaH SaFke SaFkatva Sukla tva jQAnam BUyo
   'vayavendriyasannikarṣaśca vartate / tathāpi śaṅkaṃ pītaṃ bhrāmyati / na	avayava indriya sannikarzaH ca vartate / taTA api SaFkam pItam BrAmyati / na
   tu śuklaṃ praminoti / ataḥ kāraṇamasti kāryaṃ naivetyanvayavyabhacāro	tu Suklam praminoti / atas kAraNam asti kAryam na eva iti anvaya vyaBacAraH 
   doṣaḥ / purovartini sthāṇurvā puruṣoveti saṃśayaḥ / tataḥ	dozaH / purovartini sTANuH vA puruzova iti saMSayaH / tatas 
   karādikaṃ caraṇādikaṃ matvā puruṣa eveti niścayo bhavati / sā pramaiva /	kara Adikam caraNa Adikam matvA puruzaH eva iti niScayaH Bavati / sA pramA eva /
   saṃśayottarasminnasminpramājñāne bhavadabhimatasya viśeṣapramārūpasya	saMSaya uttarasmin= asmin pramA jQAne Bavat aBimatasya viSeza pramArUpasya
   kāraṇasya kva prasaktiḥ ? nāsti / ataḥ kāraṇaṃ nāsti kāryamutpannamiti	kAraNasya kva prasaktiH ? na asti / atas kAraNam na asti kAryam utpannam iti
   vyatirekavyabhacāropi /	vyatireka vyaBacAropi /
   iti samādhānam //	iti samADAnam //
   15. doṣābhāva eva kāraṇamāstām / tathāpi prāmāṇyasvatastvahānoriti na	15. doza aBAvaH eva kAraNam AstAm / taTA api prAmANyasvataH tu ahAnoH iti na
   susthāyi / daṇḍatvadaṇḍagatadārḍhya pramukhānāṃ kāryopayogitvepi	susTAyi / daNxa tva daNxa gata dArXya pramuKAnAm kArya upayogi tvepi
   kāraṇatvābhāvavadihāpi nirvāhāt //	kAraNa tva aBAva vat iha api nirvAhAt //
   iyatā pramāṇyasyotpattausvatastve anupapattayopi parihṛtā eva //	iyatA pramANi asya utpattOsvatastve anupapattayopi parihRtAH eva //
   prāmāṇyasyotpattau svatastve kiṃ pramāṇam	prAmANyasya utpattO svatas tve kim pramANam
   16. anityayathārthajñānatvaṃ anityajñānatvānavacchinna	16. anitya yaTArTa jQAna tvam anitya jQAna tvAn avacCinna
   kāryatānavacchedakam anityajñānāvṛttitvarāhitvāt jñānatvavat /	kArya tA ana vacCedakam anitya jQAna AvRtti tva rAhi tvAt jQAna tva vat /
   ityādyanumānaṃ mānam / jñanatvaṃ anityajñānāvṛtti na /	ityAdi anumAnam mAnam / jQana tvam anitya jQAna AvRtti na /
   atastadavṛttitvarahitam / tasmādanityajñānatvaviśiṣṭe sarvatra vartate yā	atas tad avRtti tva rahitam / tasmAt anitya jQAna tva viSizwe sarvatra vartate yA
   kāryatā tasyāmanavacchedakam / jñānatvena rūpeṇa jñānamutpannamiti na	kArya tA tasyAm anavat Cedakam / jQAna tvena rUpeNa jQAnam utpannam iti na
   bhāṣyata ityarthaḥ / evameva anityayathārthajñānatvamapi anityajñāne na	BAzyate iti arTaH / evam eva anitya yaTArTa jQAna tvam api anitya jQAne na
   vartata iti nahi / tataḥ anityajñānasāmānye vartate yā kāryatā	vartate iti na hi / tatas anitya jQAna sAmAnye vartate yA kArya tA
   tasyāmanavacchedakam / anityayathārthajñānatvādinā rūpeṇa jñānaṃ jāyata	tasyAm anavat Cedakam / anitya yaTArTa jQAna tva AdinA rUpeNa jQAnam jAyata
   iti nāhvāyayate / itīdamasyopapādanam / evaṃ ca jñānajanane yāvadapekṣitaṃ	iti na AhvAyayate / iti idamasya upapAdanam / evam ca jQAna janane yAvat apekzitam
   tadadhikaṃ kāraṇaṃ pramā nāpekṣata iti phalitam / tathā ca 154 tama puṭe	tat aDikam kAraNam pramA na apekzate iti Palitam / taTA ca 154 tama puwe
   aṣṭamaṅktau"jñānajanakamātrādhīnajanmatvaṃ"ityuktasvatastvasiddhiḥ //	azwamaFktO" jQAna janaka mAtra aDIna janma tvaM"iti uktasvatas tu asidDiH //
   17. apramātvaṃ ( bhramatvaṃ ) mapi svata eva syāt / doṣastu pramāyāṃ guṇa	17. apramAtvam ( Brama tvam ) mapi svatas eva syAt / dozaH tu pramAyAm guNa
   eva bhavatu / iti pratibandītthaṃ pariharaṇīyā / doṣasatve bhramaḥ,	eva Bavatu / iti pratibandi itTam pariharaNIyAH / doza satve BramaH,
   doṣābhāve na bhramaḥ; ityanvayavyatirekayorna kathaṃ kathamapi	doza aBAve na BramaH; iti anvaya vyatirekayoH na kaTam kaTam api
   parityājyateti doṣo 'pramākāraṇamityavarjanīyameva /	parityAjyata iti dozaH apramA kAraNam iti avarjanIyam eva /
   karaṇaprāmāṇyasvatastvam.	karaNa prAmANI asvataH tvam.
   jñānaprāmāṇyasvatastve vādaprativādābhyāmeva karaṇaprāmāṇyasvatastvepi	jQAna prAmANI asvataH tve vAda prativAdAByAm eva karaNa prAmANI asvataH tu epi
   pratibhaṭaparāvartanaṃ suśakamiti tadarthamatra pṛthaṅnāyāsaḥ //	pratiBawa parAvartanam suSakam iti tad arTam atra pRTak na AyAsaH //
   18. yathārthajñānasādhanatvameva karaṇaprāmāṇyam / tasya	18. yaTA arTa jQAna sADana tvam eva karaNa prAmANyam / tasya
   jñānajanakatvagrāhakamātragrāhyatvam jñaptau svatastvam // karaṇeṣu	jQAna janakatva grAhaka mAtra grAhya tvam jQaptO svatas tvam // karaNezu
   jñānajananaśaktiryathā sahajā yathā yathārthajñānajananaśakterapi	jQAna janana SaktiH yaTA sahajAH yaTA yaTA arTa jQAna janana SakteH api
   sahajatvam, tadabhinnatvaṃ vā utpattau //	sahaja tvam, tad aBinna tvam vA utpattO //
   etatsarvaṃ"prāmāṇyaṃ svata eva anyathānavasthānāt" "parato 'pramāṇyam"iti	etat sarvan"prAmANyam svatas eva anyaTA anavasTAna at" "paratas apramANyam"iti
   tatvanirṇayasya vivaraṇarūpameva //	tatu anirNayasya vivaraNa rUpam eva //
   ādita etāvatprabandhena   	Aditas etAvat prabanDena   
   "svataḥ pramāṇairāmnāyai rādareṇādivarjitaiḥ /	"svataH pramANEH AmnAyEH rAdareNa Adi varjitEH /
   ākhyādanantakalyāṇa guṇa śrīramaṇaṃ bhaje"/	AKyAt ananta kalyANa guNa SrI ramaNam Baje"/
   iti devatāgurunamanottaramatroktaprastāvanāślokena ādivarjitasvataḥ	iti devatA guru namana uttaram atra ukta prastAvanASlokena Adi varjita svatas 
   pramāṇavedoditānantakalyāṇaguṇaḥ śrīramaṇa iti yadupadarśitaṃ	pramANa veda udita ananta kalyANa guNaH SrI ramaNaH iti yat upadarSitam
   tannānupapannam / apairuṣeyatvepi vedasya sahajaprāmāṇyānapāyāt / iti	tat na anupapannam / apEH uzeya tvepi vedasya sahaja prAmANya anapAyAt / iti
   paryavasitam //	paryavasitam //
   ataḥ pramāṇyavādānte tasmātprāmāṇyasya svatastvādapauruṣeyopi vedaḥ	atas pramANyavAda ante tasmAt prAmANyasya svatas tvAt apOruzeyopi vedaH
   pramāṇameva"ityupasaṃhāramadarśayat //	pramANam eva" iti upasaMhAram adarSayat //
   vyākhyāvicāraḥ.	vyAKyA vicAraH.
   asya granthasya dve vyākhye hastagate    	asya granTasya dve vyAKye hasta gate    
   1. yuktiratnākarākhyā ekā	1. yukti ratnAkara AKyA ekA
   2. nyāyadīpākhyā iyamaparā	2. nyAya dIpa AKyA iyam aparA
   yuktiratnākarakārā vijayīndrāḥ / mūlakāraṇāmantevāsino nyāyadīpakāriṇāṃ	yukti ratna Akara kArAH vijayi indrAH / mUla kAraNAm antevAsinaH nyAya dIpa kAriNAm
   vidyāguravaḥ āśramataḥ paramaguravaśca / ayaṃ vyākhyā śabdatepi viśālā /	vidyA guravaH ASramataH parama guravaH ca / ayam vyAKyA Sabda tepi viSAlA /
   nyādīpe caturthapuṭe"atra svataḥpāmāṇyajñaptivādaparyantaṃ vistarastu	nyAdIpe caturTa puwe"atra svatas pAmANi ajQapti vAda paryantam vistaraH tu
   gurupādakṛtayuktiratnākare draṣṭavyaḥ"ityasti / iyaṃ sampurṇā uta	guru pAda kRta yukti ratnAkare drazwavyaH"iti asti / iyam sampurNAH uta
   iyatyeveti sandihāmahe / pūrṇoyaṃ vistarastu	iyati eva iti sandihAmahe / pUrNoyam vistaraH tu
   etāvatyevetyanenāpi nyāyadīpoktisaṃgītarbhavati hi / nopalabhāmahe ca	etAvatI eva iti anena api nyAya dIpa ukti saMgItarBavati hi / na upalaBAmahe ca
   sampūrṇām / ato 'pūrṇetyatraiva pakṣapāto nyāyyaḥ //	sampUrNAm / atas apUrNA iti atra eva pakzapAtaH nyAyyaH //
   atra     	atra     
   "gurupādakṛtāpyasti vyākhyā sātyantavistarā /	"guru pAda kRtA api asti vyAKyA sA atyanta vistarAH /
   vyākhyeyaṃ mandabodhāya kriyate 'śeṣagocarā"//	vyAKyeyam manda boDAya kriyate aSeza gocarA"//
   iti / nyāyadīpādisthitadvitīyaślokopi pramāṇam //	iti / nyAya dIpa Adi sTita dvitIya Sloka upi pramANam //
   asyā nyāyadīpākhyāyāḥ kartāro rāghavendrasvāminaḥ / atra na kopi	asyAH nyAya dIpa AKyAyAH kartAraH rAGava indra svAminaH / atra na kopi
   prativādaḥ //	prativAdaH //
   eteṣāṃ jīvanacāritraviṣaye rāghavendravijayākhyaṃ kāvyaṃ,	etezAm jIvana cAritra vizaye rAGava indra vijaya AKyam kAvyaM,
   guruguṇastavākhyaṃ stotraṃ ca mudgitamevedānīmasti / guruguṇastavakartāro	guru guNastava AKyam stotram ca mudgitam eva idAnIm asti / guru guNa stava kartAraH 
   raghavendrasvāmināṃ pūrvāśrame pautrāḥ yatyāśrame praśiṣyāḥ vādīndrāḥ //	raGava indra svAminAm pUrva ASrame pOtrAH yati ASrame praSizyAH vAdi indrAH //
   mūlakāraṇāṃ chātrā vijayīndrāḥ, teṣāṃ rāghavendrāḥ"ityanenaiṣāṃ kālopi	mUla kAraNAm CAtrAH vijayi indrAH, tezAm rAGava indrAH"iti anena ezAm kAlopi
   vivṛtaprāya eva / eṣāṃ vṛndāvanaṃ rāyacūrupurasamīpavartini	vivRta prAyaH eva / ezAm vRndAvanam rAya cUru pura samIpa vartini
   mantrālayākhyagrāme bhakteṣṭavikaraṇavicakṣaṇo virājate / ime	mantra Alaya AKya grAme Bakta izwa vikaraNa vicakzaNaH virAjate / ime
   itarasanyāsina iva maraṇānantaraṃ na vṛndāvanaṃ praveśitāḥ / api tu	itarasan yAsinaH iva maraNa anantaram na vRndAvanam praveSitAH / api tu
   sarvadṛgviṣayatāpīratityakṣiṣavo vṛndavanaṃ kalpayitvāntarupāviśan /	sarva dRS vizaya tA pIratitya kzizavaH vRndavanam kalpayitvA antar upAviSan /
   pyadhāpayaṃśca / iti sāṃpradīyikānāṃ tathyavādaḥ //	pyaDApayan= ca / iti sAMpradIyikAnAm taTya vAdaH //
   madhvasiddhāntasyaibhiḥ kṛtamupakāramevaṃ smaranti   	maDu asidDAntasya eBiH kRtam upakAram evam smaranti   
   "vyāsena vyuptabījaḥ śrutibhuvi bhagavatpādalabdhāṅkuraśrīḥ	"vyAsena vyupta bIjaH Sruti Buvi Bagavat pAda labDa aFkura SrIH
   pratnairīṣatprabhunno 'jani jayamuninā samyagudbhinnaśākhaḥ /	pratnEH Izat praBunnaH ajani jaya muninA samyak udBinna SAKaH /
   maunīśavyāsārājāduditakisalayaḥ puṣpitoyaṃ jayīndrā	mOnISa vya asArAjAt udita kisalayaH puzpi toyam jayIndrA
   dadya śrīrāghavendrādvikasati phalito madhvasiddhāntaśākhī / iti //	dadya SrI rAGava indrAt vikasati PalitaH maDu asidDAnta SAKI / iti //
   itopyadhike etadīyacarite nirdiṣṭaṃ kāvyaṃ stotraṃ cāstāṃ mārgadarśītiśam	itopyaDike etadIya carite nirdizwam kAvyam stotram ca AstAm mArga darSItiSam
   viṣayānukramaṇikā.	vizaya anukramaNikA.
   vādasaṃkhyā viṣayaḥ	vAda saMKyAH vizayaH
   maṅgalācakaṇam	maFgalAcakaNam
   viṣayaprasañjakaḥ ślokaḥ	vizaya prasaQjakaH SlokaH
   1. svamate jñaptau svatastvanaruktiḥ 	1. sva mate jQaptO svatas tu anaruktiH 
   prathamā	praTamA
   dvitīyā	dvitIyA
   tṛtīyā	tRtIyA
   niruktitrayasyasudhārūḍhatā darśanam	nirukti tra yasya suDA ArUXa tA darSanam
   2. paroktasvatastvanirūktibhaṅgaḥ 	2. para uktasvataH tu anirUkti BaFgaH 
   prathamaḥ	praTamaH
   dvitīyaḥ	dvitIyaH
   tṛtīyaḥ	tRtIyaH
   caturthaḥ	caturTaH
   3. svatastve pramāṇam 	3. svatas tve pramANam

   pañcamam	paQcamam
   asya mūlalabhyatopapādanam	asya mUlalaBya topapAdanam
   4. svatastvānumāneṣu bādhoddhāraḥ...	4. svatastvA anumAnezu bADa udDAraH...
   anuvyavasāyasya vaiśiṣṭyaviṣayakatvasādhanam	anuvyavasAyasya vESizwya vizayaka tva sADanam
   anuvyavasāyasya tadvadviśeṣyakatvaviṣayakatsādhanam	anuvyavasAyasya tadvat viSezyakatva vizaya kat sADanam
   anuvyavasāyasya arthasatvaviṣayatvasādhanam	anuvyavasAyasya arTa satva vizaya tva sADanam
   uktārthe mūlakṛtsaṃmatiḥ	ukta arTe mUla kRt saMmatiH
   5. svatastve saṃśayopapādanam	5. svatas tve saMSaya upapAdanam
   vādasaṃkhyā viṣayaḥ	vAda saMKyAH vizayaH
   uktārthe mūlānumatiḥ	ukta arTe mUla anumatiH
   6. pramāṇyaniścayasya pravartamatvam	6. pramANi aniScayasya pravartam atvam
   svatastvahetūnāṃ sāmānyato 'prayojanatvapariparihāraḥ	svatastu ahetUnAm sAmAnyatas aprayojana tva pariparihAraH
   arthaniścayasya pravartatvakhaṇḍanam	arTa niScayasya pravarta tva KaNxanam
   prāmāṇyaniścayasyāprāmāṇyaśaṅkānivartakatveno 	prAmANya niScayasya aprAmANya SaFkA nivartaka tvena u 
   payogakhaṇḍanam	payoga KaNxanam
   atra mūlānumatiḥ	atra mUla anumatiH
   7. paratastve 'navasthoktiḥ	7. paratas tve anavasTA uktiH
   dharmyajñānādināprāmāṇyaśaṅkābhāvasiddhikhaṇaḍanam	Darmya jQAna AdinA prAmANya SaFkA BAva sidDi KaNa xanam
   viśeṣadarśanenāpramāṇyaśaṅkābhāvasiddhikhaṇḍanam	viSeza darSanena apramANya SaFkA BAva sidDi KaNxanam
   atra mūlasaṃmatiḥ	atra mUla saMmatiH
   svamate anavasthāparihāraḥ	sva mate anavasTA parihAraH
   atra mūlasaṃmatiḥ	atra mUla saMmatiH
   8. paratastve prathamaprāmāṇyānumityasaṃbhavaḥ	8. paratas tve praTama prAmANya anumiti asaMBavaH

   samādhānam	samADAnam
   anumāntaranirasanam	anumA antara nirasanam

   13. pratyakṣādipramāsu pratyekānugataguṇabhaṅgaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ	13. pratyakza Adi pramAsu pratyeka anugata guNa BaFgaH pUrva pakzaH

   yajñapatimate	yajQapatimate
   bhrame pittādiriva pramāyāmanugatā guṇāhetava iti mate	Brame pitta AdiH iva pramAyAm anugatAH guNa ahetavaH iti mate

   atra mūlānukūlyam	atra mUla AnukUlyam
   (4) īśvarajñānaṃ na pramotimate 'numā	(4) ISvara jQAnam na pramotimate anumA

   21. vedāpauruṣeyatvānumānādibhaṅgaḥ	21. veda apOruzeyatva anumAna Adi BaFgaH
   (1) anumānanirasanam	(1) anumAna nirasanam

   22. īśvarasyānumānikatvabhaṅgaḥ 	22. ISvarasya anumAnika tva BaFgaH

   varṇavādaḥ	varNa vAdaH
   23. varṇānityatvasya pratyakṣatvaprabhaṅgaḥ	23. varNa anitya tvasya pratyakza tva praBaFgaH
   pūrvapakṣaḥ	pUrva pakzaH
   abhyupetya samādhānam	aByupetya samADAnam
   svamatam	sva matam
   adhikakaraṇayogyatā abhāvapratyakṣatastratā	aDika karaNa yogya tA aBAva pratyakza tastra tA
   atrānuvyākhyānasaṃgatiḥ	atra anuvyAKyAna saMgatiH
   24. varṇānityatvenumānabhaṅgaḥ (1)	24. varNa anitya tvenu mAna BaFgaH (1)
   25. varṇānityatve pratyabhijñāvirodhaḥ vādasaṃkhvyā viṣayaḥ	25. varNa anitya tve pratyaBijQA viroDaH vAda saMKvyAH vizayaH

      ttajñānaviṣayakasākṣijñānaṃ grāhyaśabdena tadviṣayatvaṃ mātrapadena 1	  ttajQAna vizaya ka sAkzi jQAnam grAhya Sabdena tad vizaya tvam mAtra padena 1
   kārsnyapareṇa tanniyamaḥ avadhāraṇapareṇa pratibaddhavyavacchedaśca	kArsnya pareNa tat niyamaH avaDAraNa pareNa pratibadDa vyavacCedaH ca
   vivakṣitaḥ / dvitīya 2 pakṣe grāhyaśabdenoktasākṣijñānaviṣayatvayogyatā	vivakzitaH / dvitIya 2 pakze grAhya Sabdena ukta sAkzi jQAna vizaya tva yogya tA
   avadhāraṇapareṇa mātrapadena 3	avaDAraNa pareNa mAtra padena 3
   jñānatvagrahaṇaśaktivatpramātvagrahaṇaśakterapi sahajatvaṃ vivakṣitam /	jQAna tva grahaNa Sakti vat pramAtva grahaNa SakteH api sahaja tvam vivakzitam /
   tṛtīya 4 pakṣe jñānagrāhakaśabdena sākṣitaditarasādhāraṇaṃ jñānam	tRtIya 4 pakze jQAna grAhaka Sabdena sAkzi taditarasADAraNam jQAnam
   mātraśabdenāvadhāraṇa 5 pareṇobhayasiddhaprāmāṇyāviṣayakajñāna 6	mAtra Sabdena avaDAraNa 5 pareNa uBaya sidDa prAmANya avizayaka jQAnaH 6
   vyavacchedaḥ, kārsnyārthenāpratibaddhasarvānuvyavasāyasaṃgrahaśca	vyavacCedaH, kArsnya arTena apratibadDa sarva anuvyavasAya saMgrahaH ca
   vivakṣita iti jñeyam // 3 //	vivakzitaH iti jQeyam // 3 //
   mātrapadasya dvyarthatvamupetyāha    kārsnyetyādi // yāvantijñānagrāhakāṇi	mAtra padasya dvi arTa tvam upetya Aha   kArsnya ityAdi // yAvanti jQAna grAhakANi
   tāvadbhirgrāhyatvoktau jñānagrāhakeṇa gṛhyata eveti niyamalābhāditi bhāvaḥ	tAvadBiH grAhya tva uktO jQAna grAhakeNa gRhyate eva iti niyama lABAt iti BAvaH
   // pratibaddheti // jñānagrāhakeṇaiva gṛhyata ityukte na tu	// pratibadDA iti // jQAna grAhakeNa eva gRhyate iti ukte na tu
   virodhisāmagrīsamavahitenetyarthalābhāditi bhāvaḥ /	viroDi sAmagrI samavahitena iti arTa lABAt iti BAvaH /
   arhārthaṇyatpratyayāntatvamupetyāha    grāhyaśabdeneti // pramātvetyādi //	arha arTaNyat pratyaya anta tvam upetya Aha   grAhya Sabdena iti // pramAtvA ityAdi //
   jñānagrāhakamātreṇetyasya jñānagrāhakeṇaiva na tvadhikenetyuktau	jQAna grAhaka mAtreNa iti asya jQAna grAhakeNa eva na tu aDikena iti uktO
   pramātvagrahaṇaśakterapi sahajatvalābhāditi bhāvaḥ / yadyāpe	pramAtva grahaNa SakteH api sahaja tvalABAt iti BAvaH / yadyApe
   śakterekatvameva labhyate / tathāpi pratibandha 7 sthale sākṣiṇaḥ	SakteH eka tvam eva laByate / taTA api pratibanDa 7 sTale sAkziNaH
   prāmāṇyagrahaṇaśakteḥ pratibandhe 'pi na jñānatvagrahaṇaśakteriti	prAmANya grahaNa SakteH pratibanDe api na jQAna tva grahaNa SakteH iti
   śaktidvitvamupetya sahajatvaṃ vivakṣitamityuktam    taditareti //	Sakti dvi tvam upetya sahaja tvam vivakzitam iti uktam   tat itarA iti //
   sākṣītarasvaprakāśā 8 numityanuvyavasāyarūpapamityarthaḥ / naiyatyalābha 9	sAkzItarasva prakASAH 8 num iti anuvyavasAya rUpapam iti arTaH / nEyati alABa 9
   prakāramāha    kartsnyartheneti //	prakAram Aha   kartsni arTena iti //
   apratibaddheti // virodhisāmagryasamavahitajñānagoyarāsarvajñānagrahaśca	apratibadDA iti // viroDi sAmagrya samavahita jQAna goyarA sarva jQAna grahaH ca
   vivakṣita ityarthaḥ // 3 //	vivakzitaH iti arTaH // 3 //
   1.śabdena  cha.ka. 2.ye. kuṃ. 3. śabdena. kuṃ.cha. ka. 4.ye  kuṃ	1. Sabdena Ca.ka. 2.ye.  kuM. 3. Sabdena. kuM.Ca. ka. 4.ye kuM
   5.ṇārtheno kuṃ.	5.NA arTena u kuM.
   cha.ka. 6. jñānapadaṃ na. cha. ka. 7. kuṃ. 8.anumitipadaṃ na.  kuṃ. i.	Ca.ka. 6. jQAna padam na. Ca. ka. 7. kuM. 8.anumiti padam na.  kuM. i.
   9bhāyā  kuṃ i.	9BAyA kum i.
   paroktasvatastvaniruktibhaṅgaḥ prāmāṇyavādaḥ pu  18.	para uktasvataH tu anirukti BaFgaH prAmANya vAdaH pu 18.
   svamate jñaptau svatastva niruktiḥ // 1 //	sva mate jQaptO svatas tva niruktiH // 1 //
   yattu maṇāvuktam /"tadaprāmāṇyāgrāhakayāvajjñānagrāhakasāmagrī /	yat tu maNO= uktam /"tad aprAmANyAgrAhaka yAvat jQAna grAhaka sAmagrI /
   grāhyatvaṃ svatastvaṃ tadabhāvaśca 1 paratastvam"iti tanna /	grAhya tvam svatas tvam tad aBAvaH ca 1 paratas tvam "iti tat na /
   svamate 2 jñaptau svatastvaniruktiḥ // 1 //	sva mate 2 jQaptO svatas tu aniruktiH // 1 //
   mīmāṃsakatritayasādhāraṇīṃ paroktasvatastvaniruktimanūdya nirāha   	mImAMsaka tritaya sADAraNIm para uktasvataH tu anirukti m anUdya nirAha   
   yattviti // maṇigranthe"jñānaprāmāṇyāśraye 'yaṃ ghaṭa ityādijñāne	yat tu iti // maNigranTe" jQAna prAmANya ASraye ayam GawaH ityAdi jQAne
   aprāmāṇyāgrāhikā yāvatī jñānagrāhikā sāmagrī gurumate ghaṭamahaṃ	aprAmANya agrAhikA yAvatI jQAna grAhikA sAmagrI guru mate Gawam aham
   jānāmītyevamākārasvaprakā 3 śavyavasāyajanikā cakṣurghaṭasaṃyogādirūpā	jAnAmi iti evam AkAra svaprakA 3 SavyavasAya janikA cakzuH Gawa saMyoga Adi rUpA
   miśramate tadanuvyavasāyajanakamanaḥsaṃyogādirūpā bhaṭṭamate ghaṭo	miSra mate tad anu vyavasAya janaka manaH saMyoga Adi rUpA Bawwa mate Gawo
   jñānaviṣayaḥ jñātatādhāratvādityādyanumitijanakavyāptijñānādirūpā /	jQAna vizayaH jQAta tA ADAra tvAt ityAdi anumiti janaka vyApti jQAna Adi rUpAH /
   tāvatyā grāhyatvaṃ svatastvamityarthaḥ / atra niruktau tatretyuktyā yatra	tAvatyA grAhya tvam svatas tvam iti arTaH / atra niruktO tatra iti uktyA yatra
   śuktirajatādijñāne	Sukti rajata Adi jQAne
   visaṃvādādīliṅgenāprāmāṇyānumityanantaramidamapramātvena	visaMvAda AdI liFgena aprAmANya anum iti anantaram idam apramAtvena
   jānāmītyanuvyavasāyaḥ	jAnAmi iti anuvyavasAyaH
   tatrāprāmāṇyavatyaprāmāṇyaprakārakatvarūpāprāmāṇyaghaṭitānumitiniṣṭhaprāmāṇyasya	tatra aprAmANyavatya prAmANya prakAraka tva rUpA prAmANya Gawita anumiti nizWa prAmANyasya
   prathamajñānaniṣṭhāprāmāṇyagrāhiṇaivānuvyavasāyena grahaṇādbādha iti śaṅkā	praTama jQAna nizWA prAmANya grAhiNA eva anuvyavasAyena grahaNAt bADaH iti SaFkA
   aprāmāṇyāgrāhaketyuktyā idaṃ jñānamaprametyādāvaprāmāṇyagrāhakasāmagryā	aprAmANya AgrAhaka iti uktyA idam jQAnam apramA itya AdA= aprAmANi agrAhaka sAmagryA
   tajjñānaniṣṭhasyaprāmāṇyasyāgrahaṇā 4 dbādha iti śaṅkā yāvadityuktyā	tad jQAna nizWasya prAmANyasya agrahaNAH 4 dbADaH iti SaFkA yAvat iti uktyA
   nyāyamate jñānagrāhakānumitisāmagryā kvacidanuvyavasāyena ca	nyAya mate jQAna grAhaka anumiti sAmagryA kvacid anuvyavasAyena ca
   prāmāṇyagrahātsiddhasādhanamiti śaṅkā nirastā / vidhikoṭau bādhavārakāṇāṃ	prAmANya grahAt sidDa sADanam iti SaFkA nirastA / viDi kowO bADavArakANAm
   tadabhāvakoṭau siddhasādhanatāvārakatvaṃ tadvārakasya ca bādhavārakatvaṃ	tad aBAva kowO sidDa sADana tA vAraka tvam tat vArakasya ca bADavAraka tvam
   jñeyam /	jQeyam /
   1. 'ca'iti nāsti  cha. 2 'jñaptau' iti nāsti  ā. i. 3. śānu  kuṃ.	1. aca aiti na asti  Ca. 2 ajQaptO a iti na asti  A. i. 3. SAnu kuM.
   4 . grahāt   kuṃ . i.	4 . grahAt  kum . i.
   "prāmāṇyavādaḥ pu  19.	"prAmANyavAdaH pu 19.
   gurumate sarvajñānanāṃ pramātvepi tadabhāvavati	guru mate sarvajQa AnanAm pramAtvA ipi tat aBAvavati
   tatprakārakatvarūpāprāmāṇyasyecchāyāṃ prasiddhasyedaṃ jñānamaprametyādau	tad prakAraka tva rUpA prAmANyasya icCAyAm prasidDasya idam jQAnam apramA ityAdO
   smaraṇasaṃbhavenāgṛhītāsaṃsargarūpāprāmāṇyagrahasaṃbhavāttanmatepyaprāmāṇyāgrāhakapadavaiyarthyaṃ	smaraNa saMBavena agRhIta asaMsarga rUpA prAmANya graha saMBavAt tad matepya prAmANya AgrAhaka pada vEyarTyam
   neti // atra yaduktaṃ prāmāṇyagrāhaṇādbādhavāraṇāya tatra	na iti // atra yat uktam prAmANya grAhaNAt bADa vAraNAya tatra
   grāhyaprāmāṇyāśrayajñāne ityarthakaṃ tatpadamiti tanna / imau vahnī iti	grAhya prAmANya ASraya jQAne iti arTakam tat padam iti tat naH / imO vahnI iti
   vahnidvayagoyaraikajñānaviṣayakānuvyavasāyādirūpajñānena	vahni dvaya goyara eka jQAna vizayaka anu vyavasAya Adi rUpa jQAnena
   doṣaśādanyatarāṃśāprāmāmyagrāhiṇā 1 pyanyatarāṃśe prāmāṇyagrahaṇena bādhāt	doza SAdanyatara aMSa aprAmAmya grAhiNA 1 pyanyatara aMSe prAmANya grahaNena bADAt 
   / yattu tadisyasya tatra tadaṃśe grāhyaprāmāṇyāśrayajñānāṃśe	/ yat tu tat isyasya tatra tad aMSe grAhya prAmANya ASraya jQAna aMSe
   aprāmāṇyagrāhaketyarthatvānna doṣa iti tanna / tathāpi tadaṃśe	aprAmANya grAhaka iti arTa tvAt na dozaH iti tat naH / taTA api tad aMSe
   bhāvarūpāprāmāṇyagrāhiṇāpi nedaṃ jñānaṃ 2 pramāṇamiti tadaṃśe	BAva rUpA prAmANya grAhiNA api na idam jQAnam 2 pramANam iti tad aMSe
   prāmāṇyābhāvāvagāhinā prāmāṇyāgrahaṇena bādhāditi mūloktadoṣagrāsāt /	prAmANya aBAva avagAhinA prAmANya agrahaNena bADAt iti mUla ukta doza grAsAt /
   yadapi tatpadaṃ grāhyaparaṃ 3 satprāmāṇyapadenānvīyamānaṃ	yat api tat padam grAhya param 3 sat prAmANya padena anvIyamAnam
   grāhyaprāmāṇyavirodhītyarthasābhārthamato na doṣa iti tadapi na / tathātve	grAhya prAmANya viroDi iti arTa sABa arTam atas na dozaH iti tat api na / taTA tve
   'tatprāmāṇyeti nirdeśāpātena yathoktanirdeśe tatpadasya	atad prAmANya iti nirdeSa ApAtena yaTA ukta nirdeSe tat padasya
   prāmāṇyapadenāsāmarthyāt / gurumate idaṃ jñānamaprametyādāvaprameti	prAmANya padena asAmarTyAt / guru mate idam jQAnam apramA itya AdO= apramA iti
   smṛteraprāmāṇyagrāhakatvepi idaṃ	smRteH aprAmANya grAhaka tvepi idam
   jñānamitigrahaṇātmakasyāprāmāṇyasmṛtipratibandhena prāmāṇyā 4 grahaṇena	jQAnamiti grahaNa Atmakasya aprAmANya smRti pratibanDena prAmANyAH 4 grahaNena
   bādhāpattyoktasvatastvanirukter gurumatasādhāraṇyāyogācca / na	bADA pattyA ukta svataH tu anirukteH guru mata sADAraNya ayogAt ca / na
   coptattiprāmāṇyagranthe maṇikṛtaiva"prābhākarāstvi"tyādinā gurumate	ca uptatti prAmANya granTe maNi kRtA eva" prABAkarAH tu i"tyAdinA guru mate
   saṃśayānupapattyupapādanaprastāve idaṃ jñānaṃ pramā na vettyādāvapi	saMSaya anupapatti upapAdana prastAve idam jQAnam pramA na vetti AdO= api
   prāmāṇyacagrahostītyupetya saṃśayasyānyavīṣayatvopapādanāttādṛśasthalepi	prAmANyacagraha usti iti upetya saMSayasya anya vIzaya tva upapAdanAt tAdRSa sTa lepi
   prāmāṇyagrahasadbhāvānna bādha iti śaṅkyam / tathātve tanmate	prAmANya graha sadBAvAt na bADaH iti SaFkyam / taTA tve tad mate
   tadaprāmāṇyāgrāhakapadavaiyarthyāpatteḥ /	tad aprAmANya AgrAhaka pada vEi arTya ApatteH /
   1.'pya' iti nāsti   kuṃ . 2. jñānapadaṃ na  a. 3 sadapramāṇya   mu . a.	1. api aa iti na asti  kum . 2. jQAna padam na  a. 3 sat apramANya  mu . a.
   4 graheṇa   a.	4 graheNa  a.
   prāmāṇyavādaḥ pu  20 .	prAmANya vAdaH pu 20 .
   tadabhāvavati tatprakārakatvarūpāprāmāṇyāgrāhakasyāpi tadvati	tad aBAvavati tad prakAraka tva rUpA prAmANya AgrAhakasya api tadvati
   tatprakārakatvarūpaprāmāṇyātyantābhāvaviṣayakasya jñānajñānasya	tad prakAraka tva rUpa prAmANya atyanta aBAva vizayakasya jQAna jQAnasya
   prāmāṇyāgrāhakatvena bādhāt / aprāmāṇyapadena prāmāṇyavirodhivivakṣāyāmapi	prAmANya AgrAhaka tvena bADAt / aprAmANya padena prAmANya viroDi vivakzAyAm api
   tādṛśasthale prāmāṇyagrahamupetyāgrāhakapadena grāhakasāmagryasamavadhāna	tAdRSa sTale prAmANya graham upetya AgrAhaka padena grAhaka sAmagrya samavaDAna
   vivakṣāyāṃ ca miśrādimate 'prāmāṇyagrahasthale tatsāmagryabhāvena	vivakzAyAm ca miSra Adimate aprAmANya graha sTale tad sAmagrya BAvena
   tadasamavāhitenāpi jñānagrāhakeṇa tatra prāmāṇyāgrahādbādha 1	tat asamavAhitena api jQAna grAhakeNa tatra prAmANya agrahAt bADa 1
   evetyādidūṣaṇaṃ sphuṭatvādupekṣyoktaniruktau	eva ityAdi dUzaNam sPuwa tvAt upekzya ukta niruktO
   yāvajjñānaviṣayakajñānaviṣayatvamityeva sāmañjasye	yAvat jQAna vizaya ka jQAna vizaya tvam iti eva sAmaQjasye
   grāhakasāmagrītyuktivaiyarthyā 2 dgauravāccetyupetya	grAhaka sAmagrI ti ukti vEyarTyA 2 dgOravAt ca iti upetya
   grāhakasāmagrīpadatyāgena jñānapadena 3	grAhaka sAmagrI pada tyAgena jQAna padena 3
   vānuvadanyathāśrutāprāmāṇyapadārthe tāvaddoṣamāha    tadabhāvavatīti //	vA anuvat an yaTa aSrutA prAmANya padArTe tAvat dozam Aha   tat aBAvavatI iti //
   aprāmāṇyagrāhakasyāpīti //	aprAmANya grAhakasya api iti //
   uktavidhabhāvarūpāprāmāṇyātyantābhāvavyāpyāpyaviṣayakasyetyapi jñeyam 4 /	uktaviDa BAva rUpA prAmANya atyanta aBAva vyApya api avizaya kasya iti api jQeyam 4 /
   tena naño 'bhānārthavivakṣāpi prayuktā dhyeyā /	tena naQaH aBAna arTa vivakzA api prayuktA DyeyAH /
   nanu naño virodhārthatve prāmāṇyābhāvatadvyayāpyāprāmāṇyatadvyāpyānāṃ	nanu naQaH viroDa arTa tve prAmANya aBAva tad vyayApyA prAmANya tat vyApyAnAm
   cakurṇāmapyaprāmāṇyapadena prāmāṇyavirodhivācinā	cakurNAm api aprAmANya padena prAmANya viroDi vAcinA
   grahaṇasaṃbhavānnoktadoṣaḥ / virodhitvasya	grahaNa saMBavAn na ukta dozaH / viroDi tvasya
   prāmāṇyaniścayapratibandhakajñānaviṣayatvarūpatvādityāśayena	prAmANya niScaya pratibanDaka jQAna vizaya tva rUpa tvAt iti ASayena
   pakṣadharādyuktavivakṣāmanūdyanirāha    aprāmāṇyeti //	pakzaDarAdi ukta vivakzAm anUdya nirAha   aprAmANya iti //
   apipadenaitatsūcayati / yadyapi grāhyaprāmāṇyavirodhilābho naitāvatā	apipadena etat sUcayati / yadi api grAhya prAmANya viroDi lABaH na etAvatA
   bhavati / tatpadamilitenāpyasāmarthyādalābha eva /	Bavati / tad pada militena api asAmarTyAt alABaH eva /
   virodhimātratvaprayojakam / tathāpyabhyupagamoyamiti    ityādivākyeti //	viroDi mAtra tva prayojakam / taTA api aByupagamoyam iti   iti Adi vAkya iti //
   1.bādha ityādi kuṃ. 2.gauravapadaṃ nāsti a. 3.naivā kuṃ. 4. dhyeyam  kuṃ.	1.bADaH ityAdi  kuM. 2.gOrava padam nAsti a. 3.nA eva a kuM. 4. Dyeyam kuM.
   prāmāṇyavādaḥ pu 21.	prAmANya vAdaH pu 21.
     jñānaṃ guṇa ityādivākyajanyasya jñānaṃ prameyamiti	  jQAnam guNaH ityAdi vAkya janyasya jQAnam prameyam iti
   sāmānyapratyāsattijanyasya ca jñānajñānasya prāmāṇyāviṣayaka 1	sAmAnya pratyAsatti janyasya ca jQAna jQAnasya prAmANya avizayakaH 1
   tvādbādhatādavasthyāt 2 / jñānagrāhakapadena svaviṣayaghaṭitatvena	tvAt bADa tAdavasTyAt 2 / jQAna grAhaka padena sva vizaya Gawita tvena
   jñānagrāhakatvavivakṣāyāmapi ghaṭajñānamityādiśabdajanyasya 3	jQAna grAhaka tva vivakzAyAm api Gawa jQAnam ityAdi Sabda janyasya 3
   jñānajñānasya prāmāṇyāviṣayakatvena bādha eva /	jQAna jQAnasya prAmANya avizayaka tvena bADaH eva /
   jñānaṃ samavetaṃ jñānasamūrtamityādīvākyajanmasya	jQAnam samavetam jQAna sa mUrtam iti AdI vAkya janmasya
   guṇatvādīprakārakajñānaviśeṣyakasyetyarthaḥ / jñānajñānasyetyanvayaḥ /	guNa tva AdI prakAraka jQAna viSezya kasya iti arTaH / jQAna jQAnasya iti anvayaH /
   sākṣājjñānatvavyāpakadharmāprakāraketyapi grāhakaviśeṣaṇamastvityata uktam	sAkzAt jQAna tva vyApaka Darma aprakAraka iti api grAhaka viSezaNam astu iti atas uktam
      jñānaṃ prameyamitīti // jñāne prameyatvaṃ jñātaṃ sat pratyāsa 4	  jQAnam prameyam iti iti // jQAne prameya tvam jQAtam sat pratyAsa 4
   ttībhūya svaviśeṣaṇatāsaṃbandhena svāśrayabhūtāni	ttIBUya sva viSezaNa tA saMbanDena sva ASraya BUtAni
   sarvajñānarūpavastūnyupasthāpayatīti	sarva jQAna rUpa vastUni upasTApayati iti
   prameyatvaprakārakajñānaviśeṣyakajñāna 5 jñānasya prameyatvāśrayajñāne	prameya tva prakAraka jQAna viSezyaka jQAnaH 5 jQAnasya prameya tva ASraya jQAne
   pramāṇyaviṣayakatvādityarthaḥ / uktadoṣaparihārāya 6 śaṅkate   	pramANyavizayaka tvAt iti arTaH / ukta doza parihArAya 6 SaFkate   
   jñānagrāhakapadeneti // prāmāṇyāviṣayakatveneti //	jQAna grAhaka padena iti // prAmANya avizayaka tvena iti //
   apadārthatvādavākyārthatvācca ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakatvādestena sarvathā	apadArTa tvAt avAkya arTa tvAt ca Gawa tva vat viSezyaka tva AdeH tena sarvaTA
   bhānābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / yattu śabdānupasthitamapi	BAna aBAvAt iti BAvaH / yat tu SabdAn upasTitam api
   prāmāṇyamanvayitāvacchedakatayā ghaṭajñānamiti jñāne bhātīti	prAmANyam anvayitA avacCedaka tayA Gawa jQAnam iti jQAne BAti iti

   1 tatprāmāṇye kadācitsaṃśayādyāpātāt /	1 tad prAmANye kadAcid saMSaya Adi ApAtAt /

   rajatatvena jānāmītī"tyādimaṇyuktamāha    idaṃ rajatatveneti //	rajata tvena jAnAmi iti i"ti Adi maNI uktam Aha   idam rajata tvena iti //

   vācyatvāditi bhāvaḥ //	vAcya tvAt iti BAvaH //

   tadananaśyakatvānnānavasthetyata āha 1 / kiñceti // pravartakatvepīti    	tad ana naSyaka tvAt na anavasTA iti atas Aha 1 / kiQca iti // pravartaka tvepI iti    
   pravartakārthaniścayasahakāritvepītyarthaḥ / yadyapi siddhānte	pravartaka arTa niScaya sahakAri tvepi iti arTaH / yadi api sidDAnte
   parīkṣāyāprāmāṇyaśaṅkānivṛttāveva sākṣiṇā prāmāṇyaniścayena	parIkzAya aprAmANya SaFkA nivRttO= eva sAkziNA prAmANya niScayena
   prāmāṇyaniścasyāprāmāṇyaśaṅkābhāvārthatvaṃ nāsti /"sā ca buddhidoṣamātraṃ	prAmANya niScasya aprAmANya SaFkA BAva arTa tvam na asti /"sA ca budDi doza mAtram
   nirasyati / tasminniraste sākṣī svamahimnaiva prāmāṇyaṃ gocarayati"iti	nirasyati / tasmin niraste sAkzI sva mahimnA eva prAmANyam gocarayati" iti
   tatvanirṇayaṭīkādyukteḥ / tathāpi"yatra tu prāmāṇyajñāne 'prāmāṇyaśaṅkayā	tatu a nirNaya wIkAdi ukteH / taTA api"yatra tu prAmANya jQAne aprAmANya SaFkayA
   prāmāṇyasaṃśayaḥ tatra prāmāṇyajñāne prāmāṇyaniścayādeva	prAmANya saMSayaH tatra prAmANya jQAne prAmANya niScayAt eva
   prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ"itimaṇyuktestaṃ pratyetadāpādanamityadoṣaḥ /	prAmANya niScayaH"iti maNI ukteH tam pratyetat ApAdanam iti adozaH /
   nanu tacchaṅkābhāvaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayarūpapratibandhādiva svahetvabhāvādapi	nanu tad SaFkA BAvaH prAmANya niScaya rUpa pratibanDAt iva sva hetu aBAvAt api
   saṃbhavatīti bhāvena"prāmāṇyaniścayānavaśyaṃbhāvāt"iti maṇyādyuktaśaṅkate	saMBavati iti BAvena" prAmANya niScaya anavaSyaMBAvAt"iti maNyAdi ukta SaFkate

   hyabubhutsitagrāhyatayā tīvrasaṃvedanaṃ"ityādiprathamapādīyasudhāvākyaṃ	hi abuButsita grAhya tayA tIvra saMvedanaM"iti Adi praTama pAdIya suDA vAkyam

   jñānajñānasāmagryāḥ satvāt /	jQAna jQAna sAmagryAH satvAt /

   paratastve anavasthoktiḥ // 7 //	paratas tve anavasTA uktiH // 7 //

   "avaśyaṃ tatsvataḥ prāmāṇyagrahaṇavādināpyaṅgīkartavyaṃ"ityādi ṭīkāryaṃ	"avaSyam tat svatas prAmANya grahaNa vAdinA api aFgIkartavyan"iti Adi wIkAryam
   niṣkṛṣya vaktuṃ svamate 'navasthādoṣaṃ śaṅkāpūrvamuddharati   	nizkRzya vaktum sva mate anavasTA dozam SaFkA pUrvam udDarati   
   nanvityādinā // uktaṃ hīti //	nanu iti AdinA // uktam hi iti //

   vipakṣe 'numityasaṃbhavabādhakāntarādapi nāprayojakāḥ svatastvahetava iti	vipakze anumiti asaMBava bADaka antarAt api na aprayojakAH svatas tu ahetava iti
   bhāvenāha   	BAvena aha

   1.te 'pi   kha.	1.te api  Ka.
   paratastve prathamaprāmāṇyānumityasaṃbhavaḥ prāmāṇyavādaḥ pu   110.	paratas tve praTama prAmANya anumiti asaMBavaH prAmANya vAdaH pu  110.
   kiñca prāmāṇyamanumeyaṃ cetkathaṃ prāthamikaṃ tajjñānam /	kiQca prAmANyam anumeyam ced kaTam prATamikam tat jQAnam /

   viśiṣyāsiddheḥ //	viSizya asidDeH //

   vahnijñāne sādhyajñānaṃ pakṣadharmatābalādvahnitvavati	vahni jQAne sADya jQAnam pakza DarmatA balAt vahnitvavati

   nanu saṃvādapravṛttihetuvilakṣaṇahetusādhyā	nanu saMvAda pravRtti hetu vilakzaNa hetu sADyA
   tadvilakṣaṇakāryatvādityanumānena siddhyādvaisakṣaṇyaṃ prāmāṇyarūpameva	tad vilakzaNa kArya tvAt iti anumAnena sidDyAdvEsakzaNyam prAmANya rUpam eva
   setsyatītyata āha    pravṛttīti //	setsyati iti atas Aha   pravRtti iti //

   kvacitpramāprasiddhi vinānupapattestadarthaṃ tatprasiddhya 4 bhyupagame	kvacid pramA prasidDi vinA anupapatteH tad arTam tat prasidDya 4 Byupagame
   vyāghātarūpadaṇḍaprasaṅgāttadbhayena kvacitprasiddheravaśyavāccatvāt   	vyAGAta rUpa daNxa prasaFgAt tad Bayena kvacid prasidDeH avaSyavAt ca tvAt   
   sāmānyataḥ siddhamityuktam // sādhyamānamiti    vahnijñānaṃ	sAmAnyatas sidDam iti uktam // sADyamAnam iti   vahni jQAnam
   viśeṣyavṛttiprakārakaṃ samarthapravṛttihetutvāditi vyatirekiṇā	viSezya vRtti prakArakam samarTa pravRtti hetu tvAt iti vyatirekiNA
   sādhyamanamityarthaḥ //	sADyamanam iti arTaH //
   1. taḥ siddhaṃ   kuṃ   ga  kha. 2. aprasiddha iti   mu. 3. ṣyakatvādi  	1. tas sidDam  kum  ga Ka. 2. aprasidDaH iti  mu. 3. zyaka tva Adi  
   kuṃ vahnyavṛttiprakārāvacchinnatvādirādipadārthaḥ   a. 4. dvyana   kuṃ.	kum vahni avRtti prakAra avacCinna tva AdiH Adi padArTaH  a. 4. dvyanaH  kuM.
   pastve praprā ṇyātya bhavaḥ) prāmāṇyavādaḥ pu   111.	paH tve  praprA NyAtya BavaH) prAmANya vAdaH pu  111.
   evaṃ ca nāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ nāpyasādhāraṇyamiti vācyam / prathame	evam ca na aprasidDa viSezaNa tvam na api asADAraNyam iti vAcyam / praTame
   casvārthānumāne	casva arTa anumAne

   na ca tatra 1 prāgbhavīyasaṃskārajanyā smṛtirūpā tatprasiddhiḥ /	na ca tatra 1 prAc BavIya saMskAra janyA smRti rUpA tad prasidDiH /

   atha prathamaṃ ayaṃ vahnitvenānubhavo vahnitvaprakārakatve sati    	aTa praTamam ayam vahni tvena anuBavaH vahni tva prakAraka tve sati    
   nāpyasādhāraṇyamiti    vyaktaviśeṣe sādhyasyāniścayena sapakṣānirṇayāditi	na api asADAraNyam iti   vyakta viSeze sADyasya aniScayena sa pakzA nirNayAt iti
   bhāvaḥ/ nanu svārthānumāne parakīyavyāghācānavatārepi	BAvaH/ nanu sva arTa anumAne parakIya vyAGa Aca anavatArepi
   svakīyaprāmāṇyaniṣedhānupapattyaiva tatsiddhiḥ syādityata āha // svayamiti	svakIya prAmANya nizeDa anupapattyA eva tad sidDiH syAt iti atas Aha // svayam iti
     tathā ca sā dhīreva kathaṃ syāditi mṛgyata iti bhāvaḥ /	 taTA ca sA DIH A iva kaTam syAt iti mRgyate iti BAvaH /
   "prāgbhavīyasaṃskārādviśeṣyāvṛtyaprakārakatvaṃ tadvati	"prAc BavIya saMskArAt viSezya AvRtya prakAraka tvam tadvati
   tatprakārakajñānatvaṃ vā tatprāmāṇyaṃ tanmātraṃ smṛtaṃ vahnijñānādau	tad prakAraka jQAna tvam vA tat prAmANyam tanmAtram smRtam vahni jQAna AdO
   sādhyamānaṃ"ityādinā maṇigṛduktaṃ tatsampradāyavidāṃ matamanūdya nirāha //	sADyamAnan"iti AdinA maNi gRt uktam tad sampradAya vidAm matam anUdya nirAha //
   na ca tatreti    prathamaprāmāṇyānumitisthala ityarthaḥ / upapattāviti   	na ca tatra iti   praTama prAmANya anumiti sTalaH iti arTaH / upapattO= iti   
   tadupapattiprakāraśca bādhoddhāragranthe saṃśayopapādanagranthādaucokta	tad upapatti prakAraH ca bADa udDAra granTe saMSaya upapAdana granTAt Oca uktaH 
   iti bhāvaḥ /	iti BAvaH /

   // bhramavyāvṛtyarthamayāmityuktiḥ / dravyatvādinā vahnyanubhave 'bādhāya	// Brama vyAvRti arTa mayAm iti uktiH / dravya tva AdinA vahni anuBave abADAya
   2 vahnitvenetyuktiḥ /	2 vahni tvena iti uktiH /
   1. kha ka. pustake"tatra"iti nāsti. 2. bādhavāraṇāya   a.	1. Ka ka. pustake"tatra"iti nAsti. 2. bADa vAraNAya  a.
   paratastve praprā ṇyātya bhavaḥ) prāmāṇyavādaḥ pu   112.	paratas tve  praprA NyAtya BavaH) prAmANya vAdaH pu  112.
      vahnitvābhāvavadviśeṣyako na samarthapravṛttijanakatvāt	  vahni tva aBAva vat viSezyakaH na samarTa pravRtti janaka tvAt 
   vyatarekeṇāpramāvadityanumānenāprāmāṇyābhāva evānumeyaḥ / tata eva	vyatarekeNa apramAvat iti anumAnena aprAmANya aBAvaH eva anumeyaH / tatas eva
   niṣkampapravṛtteḥ / na ca tatrāpi sādhyāprasiddhāprasiddhirdeṣaḥ /	nizkampa pravRtteH / na ca tatra api sADya aprasidDa aprasidDiH dezaH /

   yajñapatiṭīkānurodhenārthoktirvahnitvaprakārakatvesatītyādisatyantaṃ na 3	yajQa patiwIka anuroDena arTa uktiH vahni tva prakAraka tvesatI ityAdisatyantam na 3

   1. kevala   ga. 2. pabhā  kuṃ. 3."na"iti nāsti  mu.ā. 4. ayaṃ granthaḥ	1. kevala  ga. 2. paBA kuM. 3."na" iti na asti  mu.A. 4. ayam granTaH
    mu. ā. pustake nāsti. 5. mu. ā. pustake nāsti.	 mu. A. pustake nAsti. 5. mu. A. pustake nAsti.

   ghaṭādirūpātsapakṣādvyāvṛtyāsādhāraṇam / tasyānityadoṣatvāditi cenmaivam /	Gawa Adi rUpAt sa pakzAt vyAvRtya asADAraNam / tasya anitya doza tvAt iti ced mA evam /

   'prāmāṇyābhāvagrahaṇopāyakathanasya vyadhikaraṇatvāt //	aprAmANya aBAva grahaNa upAya kaTanasya vyaDikaraNa tvAt //
   tathāca tayoreva jñānamāvaśyakam / tatra ca sādhyābhāvo 'prāmāṇyameva /	taTA ca tayoH eva jQAnam AvaSyakam / tatra ca sADya aBAvaH aprAmANyam eva /
   taccabhāvarapaṃsādhyabhūtasvābhāvarūpapratiyogijñānaṃ nāpekṣate iti	tat ca BAvara paMsADya BUta svABAva rUpa pratiyogi jQAnam na apekzate iti
   tadaprasiddhāvapi yatrāprāmāṇyaṃ tatra samarthapravṛttijanakatvābhāva iti	tad aprasidDO= api yatra aprAmANyam tatra samarTa pravRtti janaka tva aBAvaH iti
   hetvābhāvena vyāpyatvagrahasambhavā1 diti bhāvaḥ /	hetvA aBAvena vyApya tvagraha samBavA1 diti BAvaH /

   pakṣadharādyuktasādhyaniṣkarṣamāha    yadveti // kathaṃ tarhi	pakzaDara Adi ukta sADya nizkarzam Aha   yat vA iti // kaTam tarhi
   tadabhāvavati tatprakārakatvarīpāprāmāṇyasyābhāvaḥ siddhyetyata āha   	tad aBAvavati tad prakAraka tvarIpA prAmANyasya aBAvaH sidDyA iti atas Aha

   tanmātrābhāvasādhane viśiṣṭābhāvaḥ siddhyatīrthaḥ / 3. atrāpi	tanmAtra aBAva sADane viSizwa aBAvaH sidDyatIrTaH / 3. atra api

   sādhyasatvaniścayāditi bhāvaḥ    anityeti // anukūlatarkābhāvavelāyāmeva	sADya satva niScayAt iti BAvaH   anityA iti // anukUla tarka aBAva velAyAm eva
   doṣatvādiha ca hetūcchittirūpavipakṣabādhakasyānukūlatarkasya	doza tvAt iha ca hetu ucCitti rUpa vipakza bADakasya anukUla tarkasya
   satvenādoṣatvādityarthaḥ   vyadhikaraṇatvāditi //	satvena adoza tvAt iti arTaH  vyaDikaraNa tvAt iti //
   arthāntaratvarūpanigrahasthānāpatteriti bhāvaḥ / idaṃ prameyamityādau	arTa antara tva rUpa nigraha sTAna ApatteH iti BAvaH / idam prameyam iti AdO
   prameyatvābhāvāprasiddhya tadghaṭitāprāmāṇyābhavānumānāsaṃbhavāccetyapi	prameya tva aBAva aprasidDya tad GawitA prAmANya aBava anumAna asaMBavAt ca iti api
   dhyeyam /	Dyeyam /
   1. dityarthaḥ   ā. kuṃ. 2. vahnitvā  ā. mu. 3. atra ca	1. diti arTaH  A. kuM. 2. vahni tvA  A. mu. 3. atra ca
   vahnitvaprakārakaniścayatvādityapi hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ dhyeyam  a.	vahni tva prakAraka niScaya tvAt iti api hetu viSezaNam Dyeyam  a.
   na coktavyatirekyeva pakṣadharmatābalādvahnitvavadviśeṣyakatvarūpaṃ	na ca ukta vyatirekyA iva pakza Darma tA balAt vahni tva vat viSezyakatva rUpam
   prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇātīti vācyam / vyāptyā	prAmANyam gRhNAti iti vAcyam / vyAptyA
   vyāpakatāvacchedakāvacchinnatvenopasthāpitasyāpūrvasya	vyApaka tA avacCedaka avacCinna tvena upasTApitasya apUrvasya
   vyanaktiviśeṣasyaiva pakṣadharmatayā pakṣasambandhasidhyā tathānupa 2	vyanakti viSezasya eva pakza Darma tayA pakza sambanDa siDyA taTA anupa 2
   sthāpitasyoktarūpaprāmāṇyasya pakṣasambandhabodhane tasyā asāmarthyāt /	sTApitasya ukta rUpa prAmANyasya pakza sambanDa boDane tasyAH asAmarTyAt /
   etena aprāmāṇyābhāvānumityanantaraṃ ayaṃ vahnitvenānubhavo	etena aprAmANya aBAva anum iti anantaram ayam vahni tvena anuBavaH 
   vahnitvalavadviśeṣyakaḥ avanhyaviśeṣyakatve sati    	vahni tvalavat viSezyakaH avanhya viSezyaka tve sati    
   nanu viruddhaprakāradvaye tadabhāvavadviśeṣyakatvābhāve	nanu virudDa prakAra dvaye tad aBAvavat viSezyaka tva aBAve
   tadvadviśeṣyakatvamādāyaiva paryavasānam / anyathā hetoḥ pakṣasaṃbandho na	tadvat viSezyaka tvam AdAya eva paryavasAnam / anyaTA hetoH pakza saMbanDaH na
   ghaṭata ityāśayena"tadabhāvavati tatprakārakatvavyatirekatvavyatirekaḥ	GawataH iti ASayena"tad aBAvavati tad prakAraka tva vyatireka tva vyatirekaH
   siddhyaṃstadvati tatprakārakatvamādāya siddhyati / tṛtīyaprakārābhāvāt"iti	sidDyan= tadvati tad prakAraka tvam AdAya sidDyati / tRtIya prakAra aBAva at"iti
   maṇyuktamāśaṅkya niṣedhati   naceti // vyāptyeti //	maNI uktam ASaFkya nizeDati  na ca iti // vyAptyA iti //
   yaddharmāvacchinnanirūpitavyāptiryaddharmāvacchinnasya gṛhītā	yat Darma avacCinna nirUpita vyAptiH yat Darma avacCinnasya gRhItA
   taddharmāvacchinnasya pakṣadharmatayā taddharmāvacchinnasyaiva siddhiḥ	tad Darma avacCinnasya pakza Darma tayA tad Darma avacCinnasya eva sidDiH
   syāt / na tu prāmāṇyasyetyarthaḥ /	syAt / na tu prAmANyasya iti arTaH /
   na cāyaṃ niyamo 'nvayini hetau na vyatirekiṇīti śaṅkyam /	na ca ayam niyamaH anvayini hetO na vyatirekiNI iti SaFkyam /

   phalamuktaprāyamityarthaḥ /	Pala mukta prAyam iti arTaH /

   satvena tadrāhityābhāvāt / uktadoṣanirāsāyaivānityajñānetyapyuktiḥ /	satvena tat rAhitya aBAvAt / ukta doza nirAsAya eva anitya jQAna iti api uktiH /
   asiddhinirāsāyānityeti    jñānatvavaditi / tasya nityavṛttitayā	asidDi nirAsAya anityeti   jQAna tva vat iti / tasya nitya vRtti tayA
   kāryatānavacchedakatvādanityajñānavṛttitvācceti bhāvaḥ    tatsameti //	kArya tAna vacCedaka tvAt anitya jQAna vRtti tvAt ca iti BAvaH   tat sameti //
   anityapramātvasamaniyato yo dharmo anityajñānatvaṃ tadghaṭitatvādityarthaḥ	anitya pramAtu a sama niyataH yaH DarmaH anitya jQAna tvam tad Gawita tvAt iti arTaH
   bhramepi dharmyaṃśe pramātvenānityapramātvānityajñānatvayoranyonyaṃ	Bramepi Darmi aMSe pramAtvena anitya pramAtvA anitya jQAna tvayoH anyonyam

   nanu sārvajñyādikaṃ nāprāmāṇikaṃ karyatvādyanumānena siddheḥ /	nanu sArvajQi Adikam na aprAmANikam karya tva Adi anumAnena sidDeH /

   sarvadoṣahīnatā sidhyati / tathāhi / dharmādisākṣātkāravato na rāgādidoṣāḥ	sarva doza hIna tA siDyati / taTA hi / Darma Adi sAkzAt kAravataH na rAga Adi dozAH

   prasiddhavede tadupadeśakalpanasya laghutvāccetyāśaṅkya pratyāha    na	prasidDa vede tad upadeSa kalpanasya laGu tvAt ca iti ASaFkya pratyAha   na

   gaganādiḥ sāṃśaḥ saṃyogitvāt ghaṭavat / na cāprayojako hetuḥ / tasyeha	gagana AdiH sa aMSaH saMyogi tvAt Gawa vat / na ca aprayojakaH hetuH / tasya iha
   pakṣī neha pakṣītyabādhitapratītyā gaganādau vyāpyavṛttitvāyogena	pakzI na iha pakzi iti abADita pratItyA gagana AdO vyApya vRtti tva ayogena
   svātyantābhāvasāmānādhikaraṇaṣūpāvyāpyavṛttitvasya caikatra	svAtyanta aBAva sAmAna aDikaraNa zUpA vyApya vRtti tvasya ca ekatra
   virodhenaikadeśarūpāṃśavṛttitvasyaiva gaganādau	viroDena eka deSa rUpa aMSa vRtti tvasya eva gagana AdO
   sarvatra vyāpyavṛttitvāyogenaikadeśarūpāṃśavṛttitvasyaiva vācyatvāt /	sarvatra vyApya vRtti tva ayogena eka deSa rUpa aMSa vRtti tvasya eva vAcya tvAt /
   tasyāpyaupādhikatve 'navasthādyāpātena svābhāvikāṃśavyatirekeṇa	tasya api OpADika tve anavasTA Adi ApAtena svABAvika aMSa vyatirekeNa
   saṃyogitvasyaivānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ //	saMyogitvasya eva anupapatteH iti BAvaH //

   caitadanyatreti //	ca etat anyatra iti //

   saṃsargābhāvarūpas vyatirekasya tantratvepi samavāyikāraṇatvagrahe yanna	saMsarga aBAva rUpaH vyatirekasya tantra tvepi samavAyikAraNa tva grahe yat na
   samavāyikāraṇaṃ tatra na kāryamityanyonyābhāvarūpavyatirekasyaiva	samavAyi kAraNam tatra na kAryam iti anyonya aBAva rUpa vyatirekasya eva
   tantratvena śabdasamavāyikāraṇatvenāpi tatsiddhisambhavācca / na ca	tantra tvena Sabda samavAyi kAraNa tvena api tad sidDi samBavAt ca / na ca
   samavāyibhinna iva tvanmate kṛtiviṣayibhinnaḥ prasiddhaḥ / yena	samavAyi BinnaH iva tvad mate kRti vizayi BinnaH prasidDaH / yena
   kṛterapyanyonyābhāvarūpavyatirekeṇa kāraṇatā gṛhyata /	kRteH api anyonya aBAva rUpa vyatirekeNa kAraNa tA gRhyate /

   saṃyuktasamavetaviśeṣaṇatārūpapratyāsa 1 tyantarbhūtatayā	saMyukta samaveta viSezaNa tA rUpa pratyAsa 1 tyantarBUta tayA

   nimittakāraṇakāryayorāśrayayibhāvābhāvāt saṃsargābhāvasya tantratvamiti	nimitta kAraNa kAryayoH ASrayayiBAva aBAvAt saMsarga aBAvasya tantra tvam iti
   bhāvaḥ //	BAvaH //
   nanvevaṃ cedīśvarakṛtisiddhirapyevamastu / yanna kṛtiviṣayaḥ na tatra	nanu evam ced ISvara kRti sidDiH api evam astu / yat na kRti vizayaH na tatra
   kāryamityanyonyābhāvarūpavyatirekeṇaiva kṛtikāryayoḥ	kAryam iti anyonya aBAva rUpa vyatirekeNa eva kRti kAryayoH
   kāryakāraṇatvagrahasambhavena kṣitirūpakāryānukūlakṛtisiddhirityata āha  	kArya kAraNa tva graha samBavena kziti rUpa kArya anukUla kRti sidDiH iti atas Aha  
   na ceti // sarvasyāpīti // īśvarakṛteḥ kāraṇamātraviṣayakatvāt sarvasyāpi	na ca iti // sarvasya api iti // ISvara kRteH kAraNa mAtra vizayaka tvAt sarvasya api
   yatkiñcitpratikāraṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ//	yat kiQcit pratikAraNa tvAt iti BAvaH//
   nanvastvātmakālakāśāderapi svagataguṇopādānatayeśvarakṛtiviṣayatvam /	nanu astu Atma kAla kASa AdeH api sva gata guNa upAda AnatayA ISvara kRti vizaya tvam /
   paramāṇuparimāṇasya pārimāṇḍalyaśābditasya kiñcitpratyapyakāraṇatvāt /	paramANu parimANasya pArimANxalI aSAbditasya kiQcid pratyapi akAraNa tvAt /
   tatra yanna kṛtiviṣayo na tatra kāryamiti vyatirekagrahaḥ suśaka ityata	tatra yat na kRti vizayaH na tatra kAryam iti vyatireka grahaH suSakaH iti ata
   āha   pārimāṇḍalyasyāpīti // vdyaṇukagatahṛsvaparimāṇasyāpyupalakṣaṇaṃ	Aha  pArimANxalyasya api iti // vdyaNuka gata hRsu a parimANasya api upalakzaNam

   1. tti bhū   cha   ka  kha.	1. tti BU  CaH  kaH  Ka.
   nyāyadīpayutatarkatāṇḍavam ( pra.paricchedaḥ pu   326.	nyAya dIpa yuta tarka tANxavam ( pra.paricCedaH pu  326.

   īsyā nukatva bhaṅgaḥ) īśvaravādaḥ pu   327.	Isya a nuka tva  BaFgaH) ISvara vAdaH pu  327.

   tarhi paramāṇvākāśādigocaraliṅgādijanyajñānenāpi tadgocarakṛtiḥ syādityata	tarhi paramANu AkASa Adi gocara liFga Adi janya jQAnena api tad gocara kRtiH syAt iti ata
   āha    paramāṇvādīti // deśeti // kapālāderiva deśaviśeṣe kālaviśeṣe	Aha   paramANu Adi iti // deSa iti // kapAla AdeH iva deSa viSeze kAla viSeze
   satvābhāvādityarthaḥ / paramāṇornityatvena kālaviśeṣasatvaṃ nāsti	satva aBAvAt iti arTaH / paramANoH nitya tvena kAla viSeza satvam na asti

   // jñānatvenaiva kṛtihetutvādevetyarthaḥ    heyeti // tatra sarposti atra	// jQAna tvena eva kRti hetu tvAt eva iti arTaH   heyA iti // tatra sarpa usti atra
   rajatamastīti jñāne satītyarthaḥ /.	rajatam asti iti jQAne sati iti arTaH /.

   "tantubhyonyaḥ paṭaḥ sākṣātkasya dṛṣṭipathaṃ gataḥ"	"tantuByonyaH pawaH sAkzAt kasya dRzwi paTam gataH"

   sthaladvaye vyabhicāravāraṇāyādṛṣṭādvāraketi pratyakṣeti ca guṇaviśeṣaṇam	sTala dvaye vyaBicAra vAraNAya adRzwAt vArakA iti pratyakzA iti ca guNa viSezaNam

   na pratyakṣa iti vācyam / tathātve svavyidhikaraṇapadavaiyarthyāpatteḥ /	na pratyakzaH iti vAcyam / taTA tve sva vyiDi karaNa pada vEyarTya ApatteH /

   pratyātmanaḥ kāraṇatvāsiddheśca //	pratyAtmanaH kAraNa tva asidDeH ca //

   guṇeti padamiti rucidattoktaṃ nirastam / pūrvoktonnamanakriyāyāṃ	guNa iti padam iti ruci datta uktam nirastam / pUrva ukta unnamana kriyAyAm

   tathāpi tādṛśajñānaṃ kāryatvahetoḥ pakṣadharmatābalānnityameva sidhyatīti	taTA api tAdRSa jQAnam kAryatva hetoH pakza DarmatA balAt nityam eva siDyati iti
   tadāśrayatayeśvarasiddhirbhavatu ko doṣaḥ / na ca jñānamanityameva	tad ASrayatayA ISvara sidDiH Bavatu kaH dozaH / na ca jQAnam anityam eva
   sākṣātkārastvindrayajanya eva icchā jñānajanyaiva	sAkzAtkAraH tu indraya janyaH eva icCA jQAna janyA eva
   kṛtiricchājanyaivetyādivyāptibādhaḥ / jñānatvānityatvayoḥ	kRtiH icCA janyA eva ityAdi vyApti bADaH / jQAna tva anitya tvayoH

   kāryatvavyāpakam / kartṛjanyatvaṃ śarīrajanyatāvacchedakaṃ na sambhavati /	kAryatva vyApakam / kartR janya tvam SarIra janya tAvacCedakam na samBavati /
   tasya kāryatvarūpahe 4 tvavyākatvāt / śarīrajanyatvaṃ 5	tasya kAryatva rUpahe 4 tu avyAka tvAt / SarIra janya tvam 5

   / ata upajīvyavirodhānna kartṛjanyatvaṃ śarīrajanyatāvacchedakamityarthaḥ	/ atas upajIvya viroDAt na kartR janya tvam SarIra janya ta avacCedakam iti arTaH
      śarīrajanyatvavaditi //	  SarIra janya tva vat iti //
   1.kartṛpadamadhikaṃ  kuṃ. cha. 2.ceti ca. 3.rītyā  itināsti	1.kartR padam aDikam  kuM. Ca. 2.ca iti ca. 3.rItyA  itinA asti

   īsyā nukatva bhaṅgaḥ) īśvaravādaḥ pu   335.	Isya a nuka tva  BaFgaH) ISvara vAdaH pu  335.
   kiñca kṛtikāryayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahepi na jñānecchayoḥ siddhiḥ /	kiQca kRti kAryayoH kArya kAraNa BAva grahepi na jQAna icCayoH sidDiH /
   śarīrajanyatvaṃ ghaṭatvādināvacchidyate yatra ghaṭatvādikaṃ tatra	SarIra janya tvam Gawa tva AdinA avacCidyate yatra Gawa tva Adikam tatra
   śarīrajanyatvamiti kartṛjanyatvaṃ tu kāryatvena yatra kāryaṃ tatra	SarIra janya tvam iti kartR janya tvam tu kAryatvena yatra kAryam tatra
   kartṛjanyatvamiti etacca prathamaṃ jñāyata iti yathā tvocyate, tathaiva	kartR janya tvam iti etat ca praTamam jQAyate iti yaTA tvA ucyate, taTA eva
   kartṛjanyatvaṃ ghaṭatvādinaivāvacchidyate yatra ghaṭatvādi 1 tatra	kartR janya tvam Gawa tva AdinA eva avacCidyate yatra Gawa tva Adi 1 tatra
   kartṛjanyatvamiti prathamaṃ cāsya jñānaṃ sambhavatyena / grāhakasatvāt /	kartR janya tvam iti praTamam ca asya jQAnam samBavati ena / grAhaka satvAt /
   tathā ca kartṛjanyatvaṃ ghaṭatvādināvacchinnatayā prathamaṃ jñātamiti	taTA ca kartR janya tvam Gawa tva AdinA avacCinna tayA praTamam jQAtam iti
   tadvirodhānna kāryatvāvacchinnatvena paścājjñātuṃ śakyamiti kāryatvasyena	tad viroDAt na kAryatva avacCinna tvena paScAt jQAtum Sakyam iti kAryatvasyena
   kartṛjanyatvāvyāpyatvāttena kathaṃ tvadabhimatasakartṛkatvānumānam /	kartR janya tva avyApya tvAt tena kaTam tvad aBimata sa kartRkatva anumAnam /

   tadanumānameva syādityarthaḥ //	tad anumAnam eva syAt iti arTaH //

   śrotraguṇatvapakṣa iti // parimāṇavanni 2 tyaśabdena sarvadā śrotrasya	Srotra guNa tva pakzaH iti // parimANa vat ni 2 tya Sabdena sarvadA Srotrasya

   yattu maṇāvetadevāśaṅkya prathamaṃ bhūtale ghaṭonāstīti buddhirityādinā	yat tu maNO= etat eva ASaFkya praTamam BU tale GawonA asti iti budDiH ityAdinA
